description:
http://anidb.net/ch2069 [Kurosaki Ichigo] is a teenager gifted with the ability to see spirits. His life is drastically changed by the sudden appearance of a Shinigami (literally, Death god) - one who governs the flow of souls between the human world and the afterlife - named http://anidb.net/ch3720 [Kuchiki Rukia], who arrives in search of a Hollow, a dangerous lost soul. When Rukia is severely wounded while trying to defeat the Hollow, she attempts to transfer half of her Reiatsu (literally, Spiritual pressure) energy to Ichigo so that he can defeat the Hollow. However, Ichigo takes almost all of her energy, transforming into a Shinigami and allowing him to defeat the Hollow with ease. With her powers diminished, Rukia is left stranded in the human world until she can recover her strength. In the meantime, Ichigo must take over Rukia`s role as a Shinigami, battling Hollows and guiding souls to the afterlife realm known as the Soul Society.
Source: Wikipedia

REGULAR.description:
Meet Ichigo Kurosaki, age 15. He`s a high-school student who possesses the uncanny ability to see ghosts. But when he meets Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper from the Soul Society who helps lost souls find peace, his not-so-normal life becomes even more abnormal. In order to save his family from the grips of a Hollow, an evil spirit that preys on humans, Rukia lends some of her powers to Ichigo.  Much to her surprise, he absorbs most of her powers and in turn, he too becomes a Soul Reaper.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shinigami is Born!
Der Tag, an dem ich ein Shinigami wurde
Le jour où je suis devenu un Shinigami
O Dia Em Que Me Tornei Um Shinigami!
Shinigami ni Nacchatta Hi
死神になっちゃった日

REGULAR.description:
It`s the morning after Ichigo`s transformation into a Soul Reaper, and no one in his family has any recollection of the events.  Even the memory of him slaying a hollow is forgotten.  He heads off to school, where he finds Rukia in the awkward guise of a transfer student. Now that Ichigo has taken most of her Soul Reaper powers, she orders him to take her place until she is at full strength. Ichigo dismisses her request, just as a mysterious shadow begins to follow Orihime Inoue, a jovial classmate of Ichigo with a sad past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Arbeit eines Shinigami
Le travail d`un Shinigami
Pay or Play
Shinigami no Oshigoto
死神のお仕事

REGULAR.description:
Not all souls pass on properly into the Soul Society.  Sadly, they are abandoned and become Hollows.  In the midst of this transformation, they lose their hearts and seek out those they loved most while they were alive. Therefore, it is only natural that Orihime`s brother Sora, who has become a Hollow, seeks her soul.  Ichigo rushes to Orihime`s house and finds the Hollow has forced Orihime`s soul out of her body.  Will Ichigo be able to save Orihime from her own brother?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ani no Omoi, Imouto no Omoi
Der Wunsch des großen Bruders, der Wunsch der kleinen Schwester
Le souhait du grand frère, le souhait de la petite sœur
Sibling Rivalry
兄の想い, 妹の想い

REGULAR.description:
Chad, Ichigo`s classmate and friend, is given a cursed cockatiel.  He brings the bird to school, along with a plethora of injuries to his large body.  Sensing spirit energy in the bird, Rukia feels they need to perform a Konso on the cockatiel and help its soul pass on.   That evening, an injured Chad is brought to Kurosaki Clinic.  Ichigo and Rukia sense the presence of a dangerous Hollow emanating from Chad`s wound. The following morning, Chad bolts from his hospital bed and is nowhere to be found.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: And Your Bird Can Speak
Der verfluchte Nymphensittich
Noroi no Inko
Perroquet maudit
呪いのインコ

REGULAR.description:
Rukia and Chad battle the Hollow Shrieker which has haunted the "Cursed Cockatiel." They fight even though Rukia`s powers still have not completely returned, and Chad is unable to see Hollows. But this Shrieker has beaten many Soul Reapers and committed countless sins. Meanwhile, Ichigo is taking Natsuki home after she collapses from the shock of seeing the tragic memories of a boy spirit inside the parakeet. And he has no idea of the danger that Rukia and Chad are in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bats l`ennemi invisible
Beat the Invisible Enemy!
Besiege den unsichtbaren Gegner!
Mienai Teki o Nagure!
見えない敵を殴れ!

REGULAR.description:
Rukia heads out to Urahara Store to purchase supplies which a Soul Reaper needs. The owner, Kisuke Urahara, is aloof and a bit of a mystery, but he stocks strange products which he buys from the Soul Society. The Soul Candy (gikongan) which Rukia had ordered previously has just come in. Its purpose is to provide a substitute soul for Ichigo`s body when he transforms into a Soul Reaper. Ichigo can`t wait to try it out...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combat à mort : Ichigo contre Ichigo
Fight to the Death! Ichigo vs. Ichigo
Kampf um Leben und Tod! Ichigo gegen Ichigo
Shitou! Ichigo Tai Ichigo
死闘! 一護VS イチゴ

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Rukia set out in search of Ichigo`s body which has taken over by a mod soul.  Ichigo finds it at an elementary school, but the Other Ichigo has become too strong and gets away.  In the midst of battle, Rukia receives a word through her Soul Cell Phone of a Hollow sighting, but the battery dies and she is unable to confirm its location.  And the Other Ichigo, who has run away, senses a Hollow stalking a grade school student.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Greetings from a Stuffed Toy
Grüße eines Stofflöwens
Nuigurumi kara Konnichiwa
Salutations d`un garçon rembourré
ぬいぐるみからコンにちは

REGULAR.description:
The Kurosaki family drops everything to visit the grave of Ichigo`s mother.  Ichigo intended to take a day off from Soul Reaper duties, but finds Rukia waiting for him at the cemetery.  When she learns how Ichigo`s mother died, Rukia suggests that perhaps the Hollow who came after him was the one who killed his mother.  Ichigo refuses to listen and runs off. Then a Soul Reaper named Saidoh appears to take Rukia away from the temporal world in which she has overstayed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 17 juin, un souvenir de pluie
17. Juni, Erinnerungen im Regen
6-gatsu 17-nichi, Ame no Kioku
6月17日, 雨の記憶
June 17, a Memory of Rain

REGULAR.description:
The Grand Fisher appears before Ichigo and his friends.  He is a Hollow who uses a lure to seek out humans with strong spiritual energy. Ichigo is shocked when he sees the lure.  It has the shape of the young girl he saw six years ago when his mother died.  Filled with rage and disbelief, he attacks the Grand Fisher.  But losing his calm makes Ichigo easy prey... and even Rukia who comes to Ichigo`s rescue is thrown aside.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der unbesiegbare Gegner
Ennemi imbattable
Taosenai Teki
Unbeatable Enemy
倒せない敵

REGULAR.description:
The charismatic medium, Don Kanonji, exterminates evil spirits on his hit television program, "Journey to a Haunted Place" and the series comes on location to the town of Karakura.  Ichigo hates ghost programs and refuses to go with Orihime and Keigo to see the live show, but is dragged along anyway by his father and Yuzu. Ichigo is disgusted by the crowd which has gathered, but suddenly he sees a Demi-Hollow.  To make things worse, Kanonji`s actions end up aggravating the Demi-Hollow...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Assault on Trip at Sacred Ground!
Attaque pendant le voyage en terre sacrée
Burari Reijou Totsugeki no Tabi!
Störung auf heiligem Boden
ぶらり霊場突撃の旅!

REGULAR.description:
Rukia has been totally accepted by Ichigo`s circle of friends, and Ichigo continues his work as a Soul Reaper.  On this day, the two set out to exterminate a Hollow, but when they get to the location, they find nothing.  The soul they find there confirms that a Hollow had been there.  In any case, they hold a Konso to help the spirit cross over, unaware of a shadow lurking in the background.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Quincy
Der legendäre Quincy
Le légendaire Quincy
The Legendary Quincy
伝説のクインシー

REGULAR.description:
The last Quincy, who hates Soul Reapers —  Uryu Ishida, challenges Ichigo to a duel. He will scatter bait to lure Hollows to the town and the one "who kills the most Hollows" will win. Ichigo adamantly refuses, but is forced into the duel when Uryu scatters the bait and the Hollows converge on Karakura Town.  Since Hollows always seek out humans with strong spiritual energy, Ichigo hurries home, worried about his family. But his siblings are not the only targets.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Gentle Right Arm
Der Arm der Gerechtigkeit
Un doux bras droit
Yasashii Uwan
やさしい右腕

REGULAR.description:
The demonic hands of a Hollow reach out for Orihime and Tatsuki. The Hollow releases seeds which turn humans into zombies which attack other humans. Orihime and Tatsuki are surrounded by the student zombies. In their attempt to escape, Tatsuki is hit by a seed and is unable to move. She struggles against the Hollow and is hurled into the air.  And at that moment, something which has lain dormant in Orihime awakens.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fleur et Hollow
Flower and Hollow
Hana to Hollow
Samen und Hollows
花とホロウ

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Ishida have their hands full with hordes of Hollows.  During the battle, the story of the annihilation of the Quincy is told, and the reason why Ishida hates Soul Reapers becomes clear. Although at first, Ishida insists on fighting alone, the sheer number of Hollows has him worried.  Ichigo then explains his reasons for fighting and suggests they join forces.  Ishida is hesitant, but then a formidable new enemy appears before them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Back to Back, A Fight to the Death!
Retour en arrière, combat à mort
Rücken an Rücken, ein Kampf bis zum Tod
Senaka Awase no Shitou!
背中合わせの死闘!

REGULAR.description:
Yuzu gives Kon a bath and on top of that, dresses him up in a dress with a flower ornament.  Kon is irate, but Ichigo pays him no attention.  After overcoming many difficulties together, Kon has developed a close affinity to the Kurosaki family.  But believing that this sentiment was not reciprocated by the others, Kon leaves the Kurosaki house in search of a place where he would really belong.  Rukia, meanwhile, questions herself for feeling so comfortable in the real world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kon no Uhauha Daisakusen
Kon`s Great Plan
Kons großartiger Plan
Le fameux plan de Kon
コンのウハウハ大作戦

REGULAR.description:
Two representatives from Soul Society appear before Rukia.  They are 6th Company Asst. Captain Renji Abarai and Captain Byakuya Kuchiki, Rukia`s older brother.  Swinging his Zanpakuto, Renji demands to know the whereabouts of the human who took Rukia`s Soul Reaper powers.  Rukia is agitated by their presence.  Meanwhile, Kon tells Ichigo that Rukia is missing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Abarai Renji, Kenzan!
Die Begegnung: Renji Abarai
Encounter: Abarai Renji!
Rencontre : Abarai Renji
阿散井恋次, 見参!

REGULAR.description:
Renji unleashes the full power of his Zanpakuto towards Ichigo who is unable to beat back this fierce attack.  But Rukia knows that Ichigo will not give up no matter how overpowered he is. Fearing that Ichigo will be killed, Rukia throws herself before Renji to stop the fighting and tells Ichigo to escape.  At that moment, Ichigo, who was close to collapsing, stands upright... as an enormous amount of spirit power flows from his body.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo Dies!
Ichigo meurt
Ichigo stirbt!
Ichigo, Shisu!
一護, 死す!

REGULAR.description:
Rukia is taken back to Soul Society as Ichigo is helpless against Byakuya`s fierce attack.  His life saved in the knick of time by Urahara, and Ichigo is determined to go to Soul Society to save Rukia.  The next day at school, Ichigo is shocked to find that Rukia has been totally erased from his classmates` memories. However, a few remember her existence.  And Urahara begins special training with Ichigo to restore the spiritual power he lost.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Erlange sie wieder, die Kraft eines Shinigami!
Reclaim! The Power of the Shinigami
Réclamation : la puissance du Shinigami
Torimodose! Shinigami no Chikara!
取り戻せ! 死神の力!

REGULAR.description:
The final lesson necessary to restore Ichigo`s powers as a Soul Reaper is the Shattered Shaft.  Ichigo`s chain of fate is cut and unless he gets back his Soul Reaper powers in 72 hours, he will turn into a Hollow.  Ichigo is deep in a hole in the underground training site below Urahara Shop, desperate to find a way out.  Meanwhile, Orihime and Chad, who have also decided to go to Soul Society to rescue Rukia, receive special training of their own from Yoruichi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo Becomes a Hollow!
Ichigo devient un Hollow
Ichigo wird zum Hollow
Ichigo, Hollow ni Ochiru!
一護, ホロウに墜ちる!

REGULAR.description:
At Soul Society, Captain Gin Ichimaru of the 3rd Company appears before Byakuya after receiving word of Rukia`s execution sentence.  Meanwhile, Ichigo, whose Soul Reaper powers have returned, begins special training with his Zanpakuto. Each Zanpakuto has a name, and its secret powers are released when its wielder calls out its name.  Ichigo is urged to discover the name of his Zanpakuto.  Finally, the day of departure to Soul Society arrives.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gin Ichimarus Schatten
Ichimaru Gin no Kage
Ichimaru Gin`s Shadow
L`ombre d`Ichimaru Gin
市丸ギンの影

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo, Ishida, Orihime, Chad and Yoruichi get past the Seikaimon and they are nearly swallowed up by the Kototsu in the passage way that connects the real world to Soul Society.  But they make it safely to Soul Society, to the Rukon District, where konpaku live when they first come to Soul Society.  Ichigo sets out for Seireitei which houses the Soul Reapers.  Just then, a giant wall comes down from the sky, blocking Ichigo`s path... and the Soul Reaper who guards the gate appears.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enter! The World of the Shinigami
Entrez ! Le monde des Shinigamis
Totsunyuu! Shinigami no Sekai
突入! 死神の世界

REGULAR.description:
Standing before the The White Road Gate is Captain Gin Ichimaru of the Third Company.  Unaware that Gin is a Soul Reaper Captain, Ichigo sets upon him, ignoring Yoruichi`s warnings.  Upon hearing Ichigo`s name, Gin draws his Zanpakuto and attacks, forcing Ichigo to use Zangetsu to protect himself.  Unable to open the gates, disappointment fills the entourage.  Just then, the residents of Rukongai who had stayed hidden, come out onto the streets.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`homme qui déteste les Shinigamis
Shinigami o Nikumu Otoko
The Man who Hates Shinigami
死神を憎む男

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and his entourage are attacked by men on boars.  Ichigo crosses swords with their leader, Ganju, but in the middle of the fight, Ganju is shocked at the time on the clock and dashes off.   Ichigo and his friends are shocked at this boar gang which has disappeared just as quickly as they appeared.  The following morning, they prepare to set out in search of Kukaku Shiba who may hold the key to getting inside Soul Society.  But Ichigo, whose match the previous night remains unfinished, is determined to stay back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 14 Days Before Rukia`s Execution
La condamnation de Rukia, avant le 14ème jour
Rukia Shokei, 14-ka Mae
ルキア処刑, 14日前

REGULAR.description:
Kukaku Shiba, the one who knows how to get into Soul Society is Rokongai`s top pyrotechnist.  Furthermore, she is the older sister of Ganju, who appeared the previous night on a boar.  Kukaku explains how she will get them into Soul Society.  She will gather their spiritual energy and form it into a giant ball and fire it like a cannon into the skies over Soul Society.  Although it sounds ridiculous, the entourage prepare to create a giant cannonball of spiritual energy.  And Ganju, it seems, has a grudge against Soul Reapers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Assemble! The 13 Divisions
Kesshuu! Gotei Juusan Tai
Rassemblement ! Les 13 Divisions
結集! 護廷13隊

REGULAR.description:
With some advice from Ganju, Ichigo is finally able to control his spiritual energy in order to create the Cannonball.  Now that they are ready to go, Yoruichi gives the group directions on what to do when they get to Soul Society.  But Ichigo is totally spent from practice and falls asleep.  Next to the sleeping Ichigo, Ganju feverishly practices the words that will control the Cannonball.  He has decided to go to Soul Society with the group.  And just before their departure, he explains the reason for his hatred of Soul Reapers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyodai Houdan de Chuuoutoppa?
Penetrate the Center with an Enormous Bombshell?
Pénétrer au centre d`une énorme bombe
巨大砲弾で中央突破?

REGULAR.description:
The Cannonball is launched, and Ichigo and company make it over Seireitai.  But because Ichigo is unable to control his spiritual power, they become stuck within the shakonaku (Soul Shield Membrane).  Ichigo and the others desperately try to collect their spiritual energy, but in that instant, the Cannonball explodes and everyone begins a descent towards Seireitei -- Ishida with Orihime, Chad, Yoriuchi, and finally, Ichigo with Ganju.  Ichigo and Ganju make a safe landing, but are confronted by Ikkaku and Yumichika, two Soul Reapers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Formation ! Le plus mauvais grade
Formation! The Worst Tag
Kessei! Saiaku no Tag
結成! 最悪のタッグ

REGULAR.description:
Inside the Seireitei, orders are given and a full-fledged search for the Ryoka is called into action.  Rukia is transferred to the Shishinro Repentence Cell to await her execution and it is becomes more imperative that Ichigo and his fellow Ryoka learn of her whereabouts soon.  Ichigo and Ikkaku`s fight dramatically comes to a close; Ganju and Yumichika challenge each other`s tempers during their continued battle; and Uryu and Orihime find themselves trapped in a raucous chase by a group of Soul Reapers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hissatsu no Ichigeki o Houte!
Lancer le coup de la mort
Release the Death Blow!
必殺の一撃を放て!

REGULAR.description:
Forced to stay alert and on their toes. Ichigo and the others continue to be hunted by Soul Reapers.  Uryu and Orihime struggle to outwit Squad 11`s Captain Zaraki and Lieutenant Yachiru in their ongoing chase, but end up in an even more threatening encounter with Jirobo, a towering Soul Reaper, who quickly identifies Uryu as a Quincy.  Yumichika`s obsession with vanity is amplified as Ganju relentlessly tries to conquer him in battle.  In his search to find Ganju, Ichigo finds himself chased by a new slew of soul reapers as he makes his way through the maze of walls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nerawareta Orihime
Orihime Targeted
Orihime est prise pour cible
狙われた織姫

REGULAR.description:
Uryu`s days of training pay off as he is able to protect Orihime and himself from Jirobo and his zanpaku-to, known as Tsunzaki Garasu.   Ganju and Ichigo finally run into each other, but each brings with them a trail of angry Soul Reapers.  Their attempt to hold the weak and unappreciated Hanataro hostage fails when they learn that he is a member of the weakest squad.  Meanwhile, Captain Kurotsuchi questions Ikkaku about the intruding Ryoka with no success.  However, when Captain Zaraki arrives, Ikkaku`s tongue begins to loosen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Breakthrough! The Shinigami`s Encompassing Net
Percée ! Encerclé par le filet des Shinigamis
Toppa Seyo! Shinigami Houimou
突破せよ! 死神包囲網

REGULAR.description:
Hanataro leads Ichigo and Ganju toward the Repentance Cell where Rukia is being imprisoned using an underground network of sewage system passageways.  As Hanataro guides them, he recounts the stories that Rukia had told him about her time in the world of the living with Ichigo.  Upon their arrival just outside the White Tower, Renji Abarai appears and challenges Ichigo to a fight to the finish. Uryu and Orihime, still separated from Ichigo and Ganju, sense Ichigo`s rising Spirit Energy as he prepares for battle against the powerful Lieutenant.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le combat de Renji
Renji`s Confrontation
Tachihadakaru Renji
立ちはだかる恋次

REGULAR.description:
As Renji and Ichigo engage in battle, Ichigo remembers his days of intensive training under Urahara prior to entering the Seireitei.  Ichigo is forced to face and overcome his biggest fears as he proves that he has indeed developed into a opponent strong enough to face Renji.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiru Tame no Kakugo
Résolu à tuer
The Resolution to Kill
斬る為の覚悟

REGULAR.description:
Renji faces defeat, and in his last living moments, recalls his youth, struggling as a poor street kid with Rukia in "Hanging Dog" aka the  Seventy-Eighth District of South Rukongai.  He describes how they both came to move to the Seireitei to become Soul Reapers, and Rukia`s adoption into the noble Kuchiki family.  As Renji struggles to atone for the sins of his life, he blames himself for Rukia`s forthcoming execution.  In his final breaths, Renji asks Ichigo to promise to save Rukia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hoshi to Norainu
The Star and the Stray Dog
Une étoile et un chien perdu
星と野良犬

REGULAR.description:
Back in the world of the living, Karin and Yuzu find themselves entrusted with a mysterious cat that falls from the sky which draws the attention of a number of deadly Hollows.  Along with Jinta and Ururu, they are recruited by television personality Don Kanonji to learn how to fight bad spirits and protect their town.  Although they are skeptical about working under Don Kanonji`s leadership, they are excited about becoming television stars, known as "Karakura Superheroes."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiseki! Nazo no Shin Hero
Miracle ! Le mystérieux nouveau héros
Miracle! New Hero of Enigma
奇跡! 謎の新ヒーロー

REGULAR.description:
After word spreads of Renji`s defeat, an all-out war is declared on the Ryoka, allowing all Captains of the Seiretei permission to carry and release their zanpaku-tos. However, Momo Hinamori becomes increasingly suspicious about the changes taking place around her.  In the underground sewage tunnels of the Seireitei, Hanataro continues to treat Ichigo`s wounds inflicted during his battle with Renji.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tragedy of Dawn
Tragédie de l`aube
Yoake no Sangeki
夜明けの惨劇

REGULAR.description:
When Captain Aizen is discovered slain and hung, Hinamori quickly suspects Ichimaru.  In a bout of revenge, Hinamori tries to attack Ichimaru, but is stopped first by Lieutenant Kira and then by Toshiro Hitsugaya, the captain of Squad 10.  Ichigo and Ganju continue to receive healing treatments from Hanatoro until they are well enough to continue their journey to the White Tower.  Meanwhile, Chad learns the whereabouts of Rukia and the White Tower and makes his own way toward the Senzaikyu, unaware that he has been detected by Lieutenant Ise and Captain Kyoraku.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aizen Ansatsu! Shinobiyoru Yami
Aizen Assassination! The Creeping Darkness
Meurtre d`Aizen ! L`obscurité qui approche
藍染暗殺! 忍び寄る闇

REGULAR.description:
As Ichigo, Ganju, and Hanataro make their way to the top of the Senzaikyu staircase, they sense an unprecedented, vast amount of unrecognizable spirit energy.  The source of this spirit energy reveals itself as Kenpachi Zaraki, the captain of Squad 11, who Ichigo had been earlier warned of during his battle with Ikkaku Madarame.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zaraki Kenpachi approche !
Zaraki Kenpachi, Semaru!
Zaraki Kenpachi, drawing close!
更木剣八, 迫る!

REGULAR.description:
Chad`s journey to the Senzaikyu is interrupted by the Captain of Squad 8, Shunsui Kyouraka.  Kyouraka`s laid-back mentality and attempt to convince Chad to retreat irks Chad and tries his patience.  Chad realizes that time is of the essence and that he must proceed to meet the rest of the Ryoka.  As Chad starts to battle, he has flashbacks to the world of the living where he is reminded of his promise to Ichigo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kobushi no Riyuu
La raison du Poing
The Reason for Fists
拳の理由

REGULAR.description:
Chad continues to persevere against Captain Kyouraka.  Ichigo, still battling Captain Zaraki at the Senzaikyu, senses a loss of Chad`s Spirit Energy and fears for the worst.  Ichigo grows angrier and more determined as his sense of responsibility for the rest of the Ryoka increases, leading him to stand up to Zaraki in battle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Driven into a Corner! Broken Zangetsu
Désespoir ! Zangetsu brisé
Zettai Zetsumei! Orareta Zangetsu
絶体絶命! 折られた斬月

REGULAR.description:
After being attacked by Captain Zaraki`s sword, while lying weak on the ground, Ichigo is greeted by a metaphysical version of his zanpaku-to, Zangetsu.  Zangetsu takes Ichigo to develop his understanding about the nature of his zanpaku-to.  When Ichigo calls a surprised Captain Zaraki into battle again, he has a renewed confidence in the strength of his fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fujimi no Otoko
Immortal Man
L`homme de l`immortalité
不死身の男

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Captain Zaraki lie motionless on the ground after their battle.  Zaraki admits defeat and remains alive just long enough to recount his meeting with Yachiru.  Yoruichi finds Ichigo and takes him away for treatment. Ganju and Hanataro continue toward the White Tower to save Rukia.  When they arrive in Rukia`s holding cell, Ganju realizes that Rukia is not who he expected her to be...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ganju no Mita Shinigami
Le Shinigami que Ganju a rencontré
The Shinigami Ganju Saw
ガンジュの見た死神

REGULAR.description:
Yoruichi`s true form is revealed, much to Ichigo`s surprise.  Ichigo finds a mysterious mask that he remembered Hanatoro throwing into an underground tunnel.   Sensing great Spirit Energy near the Repentance Cell, Ichigo defies Yoruichi`s orders and flees to assist Ganju and Hanatoro.  Captain Kuchiki and Captain Ukitake are both surprised by Ichigo`s Captain-like level of Spirit Energy.  Rukia is upset with Ichigo for coming to the Soul Society, but it does not sway Ichigo`s determination to save her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Reunion, Ichigo and Rukia
Réunion, Ichigo et Rukia
Saikai, Ichigo to Rukia
再会, 一護とルキア

REGULAR.description:
Yoruichi appears as Ichigo prepares to face Squad captains Kuchiki and Ukitake.  In order to save Ichigo from a fool`s battle, Yoruichi pounds an anesthetic into Ichigo, rendering him unconscious.  Yoruichi`s flash steps prevent the two of them from being struck by Kuchiki, and she promises to return in three days when Ichigo will be stronger.  Meanwhile, Orihime decides that she and Uryu should disguise themselves as Soul Reapers to reach Rukia`s cell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shunshin (God of Flash) Yoruichi, Dance!
Shunshin Yoruichi, Mau!
Yoruichi, maître de la vitesse, danse !
瞬神夜一, 舞う!

REGULAR.description:
Orihime and Uryu, dressed as Soul Reapers, are met by members of Squad 12 who offer to help them, but Uryu quickly realizes that it is a trap. Squad 12`s Captain Kurotsuchi presents himself to Orihime and Uryu, criticizing Uryu as a Quincy who has no chance of winning this fight.  Uryu orders one of the remaining members of Squad 11 in the area to take Orihime and run away, acknowledging the fact that Kurotusuchi is more interested in her than a mere Quincy.  As their fight progresses, Kurotsuchi`s actions and words become increasingly more provocative and infuriating to Uryu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiretsu na Shinigami
Le méprisable Shinigami
Vicious Shinigami
卑劣な死神

REGULAR.description:
Uryu has taken it upon himself to avenge the humiliation of Soken Ishida, his Quincy master and grandfather, by continuing to relentlessly battle Captain Kurotsuchi. Uryu draws upon all of the lessons he has learned, and powers he has skillfully obtained, leading Kurotsuchi to decide that rather than kill Uryu, he wishes to capture him so as to study his distinctive powers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ishida, Extreme Limits of his Power!
Ishida, Kyokugen no Chikara!
Ishida, les limites du pouvoir !
石田, 極限の力!

REGULAR.description:
Yoruichi trains Ichigo, educating him about the potential to transcribe a zanpaku-to`s main form and materialize it.  He is moving toward bankai training from the shikai training of dialogue and harmonization, and to do so he must face and conquer difficult challenges set forth by Zangetsu.   Uryu, Ganju, and Chad are reunited in a shared prison cell, where they wonder why their wounds have been treated and they haven`t been killed.  Orihime has also been captured and kept alive, although she is in a different holding location.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Exceeding the Limits!
Genkai o Koero!
Surpasser les limites
限界を越えろ!

REGULAR.description:
Momo recalls her training at the Soul Reaper Academy, where she recounts meeting and being a member of a group field training session with Izuru Kira and Renji Abarai where they must venture to the World of the Living and participate in a training exercise against Dummy Hollows.  It is also at the Soul Reaper Academy where she first meets Captain Aizen, where he compliments her as a outstanding student among her classmates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Authentication! The School of Shinigami
Jitsuroku! Shinigami no Gakkou
Les archives authentiques ! L`école des Shinigami
実録! 死神の学校

REGULAR.description:
Momo, Renji and Kira have all escaped from their cells.  Momo, having read the letter that Captain Aizen left for her, believes that she understands the true reason behind Rukia and that she has identified Aizen`s killer.  However, when faced with the presumed culprit, Momo weakens with confusion and the possibility of a faked letter becomes increasingly evident.   Meanwhile, Ichigo completes Day 1 of his training under Yoruichi, and uncovers some interesting background information about Kisuke Urahara aka Mr. Hat and Clogs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adautsu Mono-tachi
Les vengeurs
Those Who Take Revenge
仇討つ者たち

REGULAR.description:
Rukia`s execution date is advanced to a final time on the following day.  Toshiro wonders if the acquisition of the Sokyoku is actually the intent of Ichimaru.  Renji Abarai joins Yoruichi and Ichigo on the same training ground, with the similar goal of attaining  bankai.  Renji brings with him news of the twenty-nine hour countdown to Rukia`s execution.  In her holding cell, Rukia has a revealing dream that she understands as preparation of her strength and comprehension of the next day`s events.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitsugaya, Hoeru!
Hitsugaya, Howl!
Hitsugaya, hurle !
日番谷, 吼える!

REGULAR.description:
Within Rukia`s dream, she recalls the past which she spent training under Lieutenant Kaien and Captain Ukitake.  The young Rukia admires the Lieutenant very much, and has a difficult time acknowledging what she must do after his body is taken over by a Hollow, set to attack the rest of her Squad members.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le cauchemar de Rukia
Rukia no Akumu
Rukia`s Nightmare
ルキアの悪夢

REGULAR.description:
In the world of the living, Don Kanonji searches for a way to save his television show, as its ratings continue to plummet. He discovers Kon- the mod-spirit trapped inside the body of a stuffed animal- and decides to make Kon the mascot of his show.  After naming Kon, "Karakura King", he is able to attract Yuzu, Jinta, and Ururu back to his cause, and they become Karakura Pink, Yellow, and Red: superheroes of Don Kanonji`s television show.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`éveil du lion
Resurrected Lion
Yomigaeru Shishi
よみがえる獅子

REGULAR.description:
Preparations are underway for Rukia`s execution, when Ganju, Uryu, and Chad receive unannounced visitors to their prison cell.  Kenpachi, Yumichika, Yachiru along with Orihime, break into the prison cell to assist the Ryoka in an escape.  Once they are discovered by Captain Komamura, Captain Tosen, Lieutenant Iba, and Lieutenant Hisagi, Kenpachi is left to prove his strength once again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le jour du jugement
Shokei no Asa
The Morning of the Execution
処刑の朝

REGULAR.description:
As Ichigo continues his Bankai training, Renji emerges from his own Bankai training to save Rukia.  But standing in his way is none other than his own captain -- Byakuya Kuchiki.  Does Renji have the strength to defeat his one-time comrade or will he be ripped to shreds?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Renji, Tama no Chikai! Byakuya to no Shitou
Renji, Vow to his Soul! Battle to the Death with Byakuya
Renji, le serment de l`âme ! Rencontre mortelle avec Byakuya
恋次, 魂の誓い! 白哉との死闘

REGULAR.description:
As Rukia Kuchiki is being lead to her execution, she is stopped by the ever-devious Gin Ichimaru. Just when Rukia has prepared herself for death, her concentration is broken by Gin`s offer to let her live and her concern over Renji, whose pain she can sense. Driven by his intense hatred for Kenpachi Zaraki`s bloodlust, Kaname Tosen, along with his confidant Sajin Komamura, challenge Kenpachi to a fierce battle between captains.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichimaru Gin no Yuuwaku, Kuzusareta Kakugo
Ichimaru Gin`s Temptation, Destroyed Resolution
La tentation d`Ichimaru Gin, la résolution de destruction
市丸ギンの誘惑, 崩された覚悟

REGULAR.description:
Rukia stands on the Sokyoku at the brink of her execution, not knowing that help is on the way. Captain Ukitake, Captain Kyoraku, Ichigo, and his dedicated comrades are all racing to save her life. Will they make it in time or will the power of one million zanpaku-to consume her life?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Accomplished Oath! Get back Rukia!
Hatasareru Chikai! Rukia Dakkan Naruka!
Un serment accompli ! Récupérer Rukia !
果たされる誓い! ルキア奪還なるか!

REGULAR.description:
While Renji hurries to get Rukia out of harm`s way, Ichigo stays behind to hold off Byakuya Kuchiki. Though Rukia was wrong about Ichigo`s ability to save her from execution, she does not believe that he can survive another battle with her brother. In an attempt to distract Soi Fon, Yoruichi comes to Ichigo`s aid and battles her. At the same time, Captain Ukitake and Captain Kyoraku are in hot water as Head Captain Yamamoto takes the punishment of his two most trusted captains into his own hands for their assisting in the rescue of Rukia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Shinigami le plus fort ! L`ultime confrontation entre maître et élève
Saikyou no Shinigami! Kyuukyoku no Shitei Taiketsu
The Strongest Shinigami! The Ultimate Teacher and Student Showdown
最強の死神! 究極の師弟対決

REGULAR.description:
Captain Ukitake and Captain Kyoraku face the punishment meted out by Head Captain Yamamoto`s zanpaku-to. Ukitake and Kyoraku were the first two men to graduate from the Soul Reaper Academy, but even though they are two accomplished captains fighting as allies, the odds do not appear to be on their side. After coming to Ichigo`s rescue, Yoruichi learns that her encounter with former subordinate Soi Fon is going to be much more than just a scuffle. After one hundred years of training, Soi Fon has developed plenty of talent as a warrior, though she may be a bit too sure of her skill.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bataille Supersonique ! Déterminer la Déesse de la Chevalerie !
Chousoku no Tatakai! Takeshi no Joshin, Kessu
High Speed Battle! The Goddess Warrior, Decided
超速の戦い! 武の女神, 決す

REGULAR.description:
Fueled by anger and feelings of abandonment and betrayal, Soi Fon persists in her attempt to destroy her former master Yoruichi Shihouin, but her abilities may be hampered by her cocksure attitude. At the execution site, the battle between Ichigo and Byakuya Kuchiki continues. Having completed his bankai training, Ichigo has a newfound confidence that may be the key factor in his attacks against Byakuya.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mille fleurs de cerisier ecrasées ! Zangetsu passe à travers le ciel
Senbonzakura, Crushed! Zangetsu Thrusts Through the Sky
Senbonzakura, Funsai! Ten o Tsuku Zangetsu
千本桜, 粉砕! 天を衝く斬月

REGULAR.description:
The fierce battle between Ichigo and Captain Byakuya rages on. Ichigo taunts Byakuya and demands that he use his bankai against him, while Byakuya remains visibly unmoved by Ichigo`s amazing display of power. Meanwhile, Uryu, Chad, Orihime, Ganju, and their new Soul Reaper friend, "Mini Mustache," are having trouble navigating through the Seireitei. Ichigo may be out of luck if he needs his friends to come to his aid this time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Décachetez ! La lame noire, la puissance miraculeuse
Kaihou! Kuroki Yaiba, Kiseki no Chikara
Open! The Black Blade, Power of a Miracle
開放! 黒き刃, 奇跡の力

REGULAR.description:
Byakuya Kuchiki may have been impressed by the power exerted by Ichigo, the substitute Soul Reaper, but he`s not done fighting yet. With spiritual pressure shaking the entire Seireitei, Orihime, Chad, Uryu, and Ganju wait helplessly nearby, knowing that all they can do is hope that their friend Ichigo will survive this vicious battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conclusion du match mortel, fierté blanche et désir noir
Conclusion of the Battle! White Pride and Black Thoughts
Shitou Kecchaku! Shiroki Hokori to Kuroki Omoi
死闘決着! 白き誇りと黒き想い

REGULAR.description:
Central 46 is the highest judicial body in the Soul Society. After breaking into Central 46, Captain Hitsugaya and Rangiku discover that the forty Sages and six Judges were slaughtered days earlier. Captain Hitsugaya and Rangiku soon find that they are not the only ones that have come to investigate the scene.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Reality of the Despair, the Assassin`s Dagger is Swung
Réalité du désespoir, le poignard de l`assassin est brandi
Zetsubou no Shinjitsu, Furiorosareta Kyoujin
絶望の真実, 振り下ろされた凶刃

REGULAR.description:
After defeating Hitsugaya, Captain Aizen heads for the Execution Grounds. Renji is dumbfounded as he finds himself facing Captains Aizen, Ichimaru, and Tossen at Sokyoku hill, the very same place that he was carrying Rukia away from. Captain Aizen demands Renji to put Rukia down and disappear, but there is no way Renji is going to abandon his childhood friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aizen Stands! Horrible Ambitions
Aizen vivant ! Horribles ambitions
Aizen, Tatsu! Osorubeki Yabou
藍染, 立つ! 恐るべき野望

REGULAR.description:
Furious after hearing the news of the defection of three captains, Sajin Komamura arrives at the Sokyoku ready to beat the treachery out of Aizen and his lackeys. Captain Komamura quickly realizes that deception is even a part of Sosuke Aizen`s fighting technique, and the rogue captain proves to be more of a challenge than he expected. Ichigo, battered after his clash with Byakuya Kuchiki, lies helplessly on the sidelines, watching this battle between captains.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gather Together! Army of the Strongest Shinigami!
Rassemblement ! La plus forte organisation de Shinigamis
Shuuketsu Seyo! Saikyou no Shinigami Gundan
集結せよ! 最強の死神軍団

REGULAR.description:
eace returns as the Soul Society recuperates from the deep wounds left by the treachery of Captain Aizen and his partners in crime. Captain Komamura and Lieutenant Hisagi visit the graves of fallen comrades, while Hitsugaya visits Hinamori and hopes for her quick recovery from the wounds she received from Captain Aizen. Ichigo has recovered from his own injuries, and in the district of Squad Eleven he meets up with Orihime, who informs him that Rukia has gone missing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La décision de Rukia, les sentiments d`Ichigo
Rukia no Ketsui, Ichigo no Omoi
Rukia`s Decision, Ichigo`s Feelings
ルキアの決意, 一護の想い

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and his friends have returned from the Soul Society and are finally able to get back to their "normal" lives. On the first day back at school, Renji shows up unannounced, dressed in his out-dated seventies` fashion. Since things have settled down in the Soul Society, Renji has been sent to Karakura Town to oversee the eradication of Hollows, and Ichigo has no choice but to work with him. Meanwhile, Yoruichi has become aware of an unusual presence in town.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: New School Term, Renji has come to the Material World?!
Nouveau trimestre scolaire, Renji arrive au monde des humains ?!
Shingakki, Gense ni Renji ga Yatte Kita !?
新学期, 現世に恋次がやって来た!?

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and his friends meet at school and set out to look for Orihime the day after her disappearance. It seems that her school chums have lost all memories of her existence. The only clue that Ichigo and the others find at the site of her disappearance is a bizarre, round footprint. Renji gets a call on his Soul Pager telling him, "I have your friend. You`ll get her back if you win."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Creeping Fear, The Second Victim
Shinobiyoru Kyoufu, Nibanme no Giseisha
Terreur rampante, la seconde victime !
忍び寄る恐怖, 2番目の犠牲者

REGULAR.description:
After Chad`s kidnapping, Ichigo and the others go to Urahara to explain their predicament. Ichigo receives a phone call from Lirin who instructs Ichigo to bring all of his friends to the Karakura Museum. Though they know they are walking into a trap, they go to the museum and immediately find themselves stuck inside a labyrinth that they must navigate their way through in order to free their friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Break Through! Trap that Lurks in the Maze
Passons à travers ! Le piège caché dans le labyrinthe
Toppa Seyo! Meikyuu ni Hisomu Wana
突破せよ! 迷宮に潜む罠

REGULAR.description:
Chad and Orihime are rescued, but when Lirin tells them that one of their friends has been replaced by an impostor, they realize that the game is not over. Ichigo, Renji, Uryu, Chad, and Orihime struggle to figure out which one of them is the phony, and if they don`t hurry, all of their classmates will disappear.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Game of Death! Disappearing Classmate
Jeu mortel ! Le camarade manquant !
Shi no Game! Kieru Classmate
死のゲーム! 消えるクラスメイト

REGULAR.description:
Lirin sets in place a giant gate that begins to devour everything in Karakura Town. The only way to have Chad released and save the town is to destroy the gate. Ichigo and the others have only thirty minutes before the gate sucks up everything in the vicinity. Meanwhile, Yoruichi and Soifon discover a strange soul wandering the streets of the World of the Living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma no Shoutai, Akasareta Himitsu
La véritable identité du Diable, le secret qui est révélé !
The Demon`s True Form, The Secret Revealed
悪魔の正体, 明かされた秘密

REGULAR.description:
New information has come to light regarding an unusual race known as Bounts. Kisuke Urahara explains that Bounts are beings that gain eternal life by absorbing the souls of humans. Urahara warns Ichigo that he and his friends may be in danger because Bounts tend to target humans with high-level abilities. Lirin, Noba, and Kurodo prove to be very useful when it`s revealed that they all contain reishi sensors that can detect Bounts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bounts ! Les chasseurs d`âmes !
Its Name is Bount! Those Who Hunt Souls
Sono Na wa Bount! Tamashii o Karu Mono-tachi
その名はバウント! 魂を狩る者たち

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Lirin find themselves in a pinch when they are attacked by the Bount Yoshino Soma and her Doll, Goethe. An unexpected visit from Rukia comes just in the nick of time, but she and Ichigo appear to be outmatched when the Bount Ryo Udagawa and his Doll, Friede, join the fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Retour de Rukia ! La renaissance de l`equipe de remplacement !
Rukia no Kikan! Daikou Team Fukkatsu
Rukia`s Return! Substitute Team Revival
ルキアの帰還! 代行チーム復活

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo, Rukia, Orihime, Chad, and Uryu surround the Bount Ryo Udagawa, but they find themselves at a slight disadvantage when he releases the immense power of his Doll, Friede. Friede`s snakelike attacks are quickly directed towards Uryu when Udagawa finds out that Uryu is a Quincy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gekitotsu no Toki! Quincy ni Semaru Ma no Te
Le moment de la collision ! Une mauvaise main se profile près du Quincy !
The Moment of Collision!! An Evil Hand Draws Near to the Quincy
激突の時! クインシーに迫る魔の手

REGULAR.description:
Upon visiting Uryu in the hospital, Ichigo and Rukia must fight off a wave of rushing water that turns into a water doll belonging to two malevolent Bounts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Assaut de l`eau ! Évasion de l`hôpital fermé !
Mizu no Kougeki! Tozasareta Byouin kara no Dasshutsu
Water assault! Escape from the closed hospital
水の攻撃! 閉ざされた病院からの脱出

REGULAR.description:
As Ichigo and his friends try to fight off Ho and Ban, the two Bounts, Udagawa tries to persuade Yoshino, a renegade bount, to return to Master Kariya`s fold.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ba Un to Shuuketsu! Ugokidasu Otoko
Gathering at the Place of Fortune! The Man who makes his Move
Rassemblement à la Place de Fortune ! L`homme qui fait son mouvement !
場運と集結! 動き出す男

REGULAR.description:
Yoshino finds Uryu and takes him back to her home to protect him. There, she reveals to Uryu her difficult life as a Bount and hope she had been given by Kariya.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eien o Ikiru Ichizoku no Kioku
Memories of an Eternally Living Clan
Mémoires d`un clan éternellement vivant !
永遠を生きる一族の記憶

REGULAR.description:
Thrown together by fate, Uryu and Yoshino find themselves strange allies in a desperate fight against Koga and his feminine killing machine, Dalc.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Earth-Shattering Event at 11th Squad! The Shinigami who Rises Again
Evènement bouleversant pour la 11ème Division ! Le Shinigami qui sort de l`oubli !
Juuichi Ban Tai Gekishin! Yomigaetta Shinigami
十一番隊激震! よみがえった死神

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo, Rukia, Ririn, Noba, and Kurodo enter Jin Kariya`s mansion and come face to face with him and the other Bounts.  As Ichigo challenges Udagawa. Rukia rushes deeper into the mansion to rescue Uryu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chikara no Gekitotsu! Frido vs Zangetsu
Crashing Force! Frido vs Zangetsu
Explosion de force ! Freed contre Zangetsu !
力の激突! フリードVS斬月

REGULAR.description:
In the depths of Kariya`s mansion, Ichigo faces off against Maki Ichinose, a soul reaper formerly of Squad 11.  But before he can cast the final blow on Ichigo, Kariya steps in and approaches Ichigo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Disparition de la rancune ! Le Shinigami que Kenpachi a tué !
Kienu Onnen! Kenpachi ga Kitta Shinigami
Unquellable Hatred! The Shinigami that Kenpachi Cut Down
消えぬ怨念! 剣八が斬った死神

REGULAR.description:
His confidence lost from battling Kariya, Ichigo undergoes more training with Ganju and Renji to regain his courage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gotei Juusan Tai Kyougaku!! Rekishi ni Uzumoreta Shinjitsu
Surprenantes révélations pour les 13 Divisions ! La vérité cachée dans l`histoire !
The Gotei 13, Shocked!! Truth Buried by History
護廷十三隊驚愕!! 歴史に埋もれた真実

REGULAR.description:
Yoshino leaves Urahara`s Shop and heads for Kariya`s mansion to finally destroy him once and for all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La décision de mourir de Yoshino !
Yoshino, Shi o Kaketa Omoi
Yoshino`s Decision of Death
芳野, 死をかけた想い

REGULAR.description:
In preparation for the Bounts` next attack, Lirin, Kurodo and Noba set up a bunch of traps, specifically designed for catching Bounts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Assault From a Formidable Enemy! A Tiny Final Line of Defense?!
Assaut d`un incroyable ennemi! Une minuscule dernière ligne de défense !
Kyouteki no Kyuushuu! Chiisana Saishuu Boueisen!?
強敵の急襲! 小さな最終防衛線!?

REGULAR.description:
The Bounts have released an army of Bittos, soul-sucking monsters, throughout Karakura Town.  With the Stealth Force unable to capture them, Hitsugaya puts together a team of soul reapers to head up to the World of the Living and stop them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitsugaya Moves! The Attacked City
Hitsugaya Ugoku! Osowareta Machi
Hitsugaya réagit ! La ville attaquée
日番谷動く! 襲われた街

REGULAR.description:
Kariya sends his fellow Bounts to stop Ichigo and his friends.  After Ichigo stops a Bitto from taking Keigo`s soul, he`s attacked by Koga and his doll Dalc, filled with new power she received from the Bittos.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo VS Dark! Shiroki Yami no Shutsugen
Ichigo contre Daruku ! Arrivée progressive de l`obscurité
Ichigo vs. Dalk! The Appearance of the Faded Darkness
一護VSダルク! 白き闇の出現

REGULAR.description:
Deeply engaged in battle, Koga warns Ichigo that if he doesn`t back down soon, his life will be snuffed out.  But Ichigo is never one to back down from a challenge...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gray Shadow, The Secret of the Dolls
Haiiro no Kage, Doll no Himitsu
L`ombre grise, le secret des poupées
灰色の影, ドールの秘密

REGULAR.description:
As Hanataro does his best to heal Renji, it`s up to Rukia, Kurodo and Orihime to fight off the Bount, Yoshi and her vicious dolls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Breaking Up of the Substitute Team? The Betrayal of Rukia
Daikou Team Bunretsu? Uragitta Rukia
Rupture dans l`équipe de remplacement ?! La trahison de Rukia
代行チーム分裂? 裏切ったルキア

REGULAR.description:
Possessed by Mabashi the Bount`s doll, Ritz, Rukia attacks her friends with all her powers. Will Orihime`s desperate pleas and Shun Shun Rikka powers be enough to save them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle of Tears! Rukia vs. Orihime
Le combat des larmes ! Rukia contre Orihime
Namida no Shitou! Rukia vs Orihime
涙の死闘! ルキアvs織姫

REGULAR.description:
Chad, Noba and Ururu have their work cut out for them when they take on Sawatari`s doll, Baura, which appears to be a giant fish.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rangiku Dances! Cut Down the Invisible Enemy
Rangiku Mau! Mienai Teki o Kire
Rangiku danse ! Trancher l`ennemi invisible
乱菊舞う! 見えない敵を斬れ

REGULAR.description:
Combining all their powers, Chad, Noba and Rangiku put together a plan to stop Sawatari and Baura.  Will they defeat this elderly bount or will they turn into fish food?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya Assembles! The Gotei 13 Make Their Move
Byakuya Shoushuu! Ugokidasu Gotei Juusan Tai
Byakuya convoqué ! Les 13 Divisions s`organisent !
白哉召集! 動き出す護廷十三隊

REGULAR.description:
Rukia, Chad, Orihime, Noba, and Kurodo return to Urahara`s Shop. While getting medical treatment, they discuss how the Bounts are fighting with more power than ever. Meanwhile, Yumichika discovers the cave in which Kariya and his gang are hidden—the ruins where ancient Bounts used to live in hiding. Rangiku, Izuru, Shuhei, and Yumichika enter the cave where one of the Bounts, Ugaki, has set up an enormous trap using Doll Gesell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Annihilation des Lieutenants ?! Piège dans la caverne souterraine
Annihilation of the Vice Captains!? Trap in the Underground Cave
Fuku Taichou Zenmetsu!? Chikadoukustu no Wana
副隊長全滅!? 地下洞窟の罠

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo, Renji, Rukia, Chad, Orihime, and the others enter the cavernous hideout of the Bounts. As they cautiously proceed, the eyes of the Doll Gesell suddenly appear. They follow Gesell`s eyes deeper into the cave and a battle ensues. Meanwhile, Squad 12 Lieutenant Nemu Kurotsuchi confronts Uryu, who was training deep in the mountains to regain his powers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rematch?! Ishida vs. Nemu
Revanche ?! Ishida contre Nemu
Saisen!? Ishida VS Nemu
再戦!? 石田 VS ネム

REGULAR.description:
Near the end of Gesell`s labyrinth, the Doll  reveals her true form to Ichigo and Renji. Ichigo stands ready with his zangetsu, but Renji steps forward and insists on taking her on solo. Renji, who has been fighting alongside Ichigo since arriving in the World of the Living, regrets his past carelessness. Feeling guilty that he was unable to save some souls, Renji wants to turn this desperate situation into an opportunity to redeem himself. A fierce battle between Renji and Gesell in their true forms is about to begin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Abarai Renji, Soul of Bankai!
Abarai Renji, Tamashii no Bankai!
Abarai Renji, l`âme du Bankai !
阿散井恋次, 魂の卍解!

REGULAR.description:
The true mission of the Bounts is disclosed by Jin Kariya during a burly fight with Ichigo.  Kariya explains the origin of the Bounts and their plan to destroy the Soul Society.  As their brawl advances, Ichigo`s Getsugatensho is proven useless as his very own Zanpakuto is turned against him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinigami and Quincy, the Reviving Power
Shinigami et Quincy, les pouvoirs retrouvés !
Shinigami to Quincy, Yomigaeru Chikara
死神とクインシー, よみがえる力

REGULAR.description:
The Bounts arrive in the Soul Society and find themselves immediately engaged in war.  Kariya and Koga are greeted by two of the Seireitei`s finest, Squad 2 Lieutenant Marechiyo Omaeda and Squad 7 Lieutenant Tetsuzaemon Iba.  The Bounts` ability to rapidly gain power by absorbing reishi while in the Soul Society has tipped the scales in their favor considerably. Ichigo and the others are in for a suprise when they find out that the metal doll, Dalk, is stronger than ever and eager to terrorize the men of the Soul Society.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: De retour dans le monde des Shinigami !
Enter the World of the Shinigami Again
Shinigami Sekai e no Totsunyuu, Futatabi
死神世界への突入, 再び

REGULAR.description:
Back in the Soul Society, Rukia is at a stand still as she faces the ever arogant Yoshi in the middle of the Rukon District.  With Lirin by her side and lacking most of her Soul Reaper powers, Rukia decides to stay and fight with what little spirit energy she has left. A Mod Soul and Martial Arts might not be enough to take on the reishi absorbing, blood thirsty Yoshi and her Nieder Sword Attacks this time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Assault of the Bounts! Chaos in the Gotei 13
Bount Kyoushuu! Gekishin no Gotei Juusan Tai
L`assaut des Bounts ! Chaos dans les 13 Divisions
バウント強襲! 激震の護廷十三隊

REGULAR.description:
There is quite a bit of commotion in the Soul Society as an explosion at the Shishinro Repentance Cell marks the declaration of war by Jin Kariya.  The  Bounts are causing a raucous and exhibiting their power in Kusjishi, the roughest part of the Rukon District, while the entire Soul Society prepares for the unavoidable war.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitsugaya no Ketsui! Gekitotsu no Toki Semaru
Hitsugaya`s Resolution! The Moment of Conflict Approaches
La décision de Hitsugaya ! L`heure de la confrontation approche
日番谷の決意! 激突の時迫る

REGULAR.description:
A fight in the forest is on as Jin Kariya and Captain Byakuya Kuchiki meet for the first time.  A colossal amount of spiritual pressure surges through the trees when the power of these two veteran warriors collides. Kariya gloats as he effortlessly pairs his newly introduced Doll against Byakuya`s Zanpakuto but neither of these two forces is easily discouraged.  Meanwhile, Koga and Ichinose are hard at work recruiting the residents of Kusajishi to help take on the Seireitei.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya Shutsujin! Kaze o Saku Sakura no Mai
Byakuya Takes the Field! Dance of the Wind-Splitting Cherry Blossoms
Byakuya dans la bataille ! La danse des fleurs de cerisiers qui déchire le vent
白哉出陣! 風を裂く桜の舞

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo rushes to the site where Byakuya and Kariya are fighting and releases his Bankai upon Kariya. Byakuya also releases his Bankai to attack Kariya, but Ichigo and Byakuya are not in sync and can`t harm Kariya. The three reach a deadlock. Suddenly someone attacks with immense spiritual pressure. She calls herself Rantao and is the creator of the Bounts. Meanwhile, Ganju and others arrive at Bull`s hideout in Kusajishi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo Byakuya Kariya, Battle of the Three Extremes!
Ichigo Byakuya Kariya, Sankyoku no Tatakai!
Ichigo, Byakuya, Kariya, le combat des trois extrêmes !
一護・白哉・狩矢, 三極の戦い!

REGULAR.description:
Hitsugaya learns that the Bounts have gathered mobs of followers, so he goes to the forest in Kusajishi with Rangiku and Renji and starts investigating. Meanwhile, buildings in the Seireitei that were destroyed by Ichinose are being restored. Mayuri notices something and returns to the Department of Research and Development. In the meantime, Kenpachi and Yachiru get ready for a fight at the Squad 11 barracks. The tension in the Seireitei heightens as the Bounts make their move.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitsugaya Moves Out! Cut Down the Enemy in the Forest
Hitsugaya Shutsugeki! Mori no Naka no Teki o Kire
Hitsugaya passe à l`attaque ! Abattre les ennemis dans la forêt
日番谷出撃! 森の中の敵を斬れ

REGULAR.description:
Hitsugaya and the others arrive at the Bounts` hideout, where Ichinose is waiting for them alone. Ichinose plans to detain them himself to help Kariya and his group, who are already headed for the Seireitei. Ichigo and Chad arrive, and with the others, they surround Ichinose, and he releases his zanpakuto, Nijigasumi, to take control of Ichigo and others. But someone appears in the crowd and blows out Ichinose`s Nijigasumi with immense spiritual pressure.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash ! Zaraki Kenpachi contre Ichinose Maki
Clash! Zaraki Kenpachi vs. Ichinose Maki
Gekitotsu! Zaraki Kenpachi VS Ichinose Maki
激突! 更木剣八VS一之瀬真樹

REGULAR.description:
Kariya and the others successfully open the Seireimon using the mobs from Kusajishi. Upon entering, they attack not only the Soul Reaper guards, but the mobs as well—and confusion reigns. Ichigo and the others leave Orihime to take care of the injured gate guards and enter the Seireitei. In the Seireitei, the captains hold an officers` meeting to discuss what action they will take. Meanwhile, the Bount Mabashi enters the Seireitei and attacks the Soul Reapers using Ritze.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinigami VS Shinigami! Bousousuru Chikara
Shinigami contre Shinigami ! Une puissance écrasante
Shinigami vs. Shinigami! The Uncontrollable Power
死神VS死神! 暴走する力

REGULAR.description:
Soi Fon is poisoned by a member of her punishment force, which is under Ritze`s control. Having increased her power, Ritze now can control several Soul Reapers at a time. The punishment force Ritze controls begin fighting each other in front of Soi Fon. The poison has affected Soi Fon, and she is barely able to escape. Soul Reapers who were controlled by Ritze fight each other everywhere, causing a big disturbance in the Seireitei. Shuhei, who had fought Ritz, and Captain Komamura of Squad 7, try to save the day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Soi Fon Dies? The Last of the Secret Mobile Corps
Soi Fon Shisu? Onmitsu Kidou no Saigo
Soi Fon meurt ?! La dernière unité mobile secrète
砕蜂死す? 隠密機動の最後

REGULAR.description:
Sawatari enters the Seireitei and sees Mayuri Kurotsuchi, the captain of Squad 12. Mayuri proposes that he become a guinea pig for an experiment, but Sawatari refuses and attacks Mayuri using the Doll Baura. Mayuri releases his zanpakuto to counterattack, but he is severely injured by Baura, who has become more powerful since coming to the Soul Society. In the middle of the battle, Mayuri sees the key to Baura`s attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Bankai de Mayuri ! Sawatari, Le clash des démons
Mayuri Bankai!! Sawatari Akuma no Gekitotsu
Mayuri`s Bankai!! Sawatari Clash of the Demon
マユリ卍解!! 沢渡・悪魔の激突

REGULAR.description:
The battle between the Soul Reapers and Bounts intensifies. Kariya suddenly appears at the Department of Research and Development, where he looks for an original crest of the Bounts and interrogates Nemu. Ichigo and Chad arrive there and challenge Kariya. Meanwhile, Uryu battles Yoshi, who kicks the Soul Reapers out of the Seireitei. Uryu purposely changes the battle site because he doesn`t want to involve the injured Soul Reapers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le dernier Quincy ! L`explosion du pouvoir
Saigo no Quincy! Bouhatsusuru Chikara
The Last Quincy! The Exploding Power
最後のクインシー! 暴発する力

REGULAR.description:
Uryu is severely injured by Nieder`s attack but tries desperately to counterattack, though his weapon seems to have run out of power. Yoshi thoroughly revels in the fight in the Soul Society because she can do whatever she wants. Uryu seeks clues in an attempt to counterattack Yoshi. In the meantime, the Soul Reapers discuss what they will do after Kariya takes away the Jokai Crest, which has the power to destroy the Seireitei. The situation does not look good, and some captains no longer believe the fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ishida, Genkai o Koete Ute!
Ishida, The Limit Breaching Attack!
Ishida, les limites repoussées pour attaquer !
石田, 限界を超えて撃て!

REGULAR.description:
The Soul Reapers of Squad 10 find Koga. Hitsugaya, with all the Soul Reapers of Squad 10, uses Kurodo as a Bount sensor and tries to capture Koga, who is hiding in the Seireitei. Under the orders of Hitsugaya and Rangiku, Squad 10 members pursue Koga, but he interferes with their communications system and attacks. Hitsugaya sees his men lying injured and decides to fight Koga alone. Hitsugaya releases Hyorinmaru and begins battling Dalk.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 10th Squad`s Struggle to the Death! The Release of Hyourinmaru
La lutte de la 10ème Division, l`éveil de Hyourinmaru
Shitou Juubantai! Hyourinmaru o Hanate
死闘十番隊! 氷輪丸を放て

REGULAR.description:
Captain Hitsugaya has defeated Koga, leaving Jin Kariya as the last surviving Bount. When Hitsugaya returns to the Squad Ten barracks, he finds that Ichigo and his friends have made themselves at home while Uryu recovers from his fight with Yoshi. Jin Kariya, having obtained the Jokai Crest, has been in hiding until the Crest`s power has filled his body.  Kariya is attacked by Rantao and during their fight, the secrets from her past are revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kariya ! Le compte à rebours de l`explosion
Kariya! Bakuhatsu e no Countdown
Kariya! Countdown to the Detonation
狩矢! 爆発へのカウントダウン

REGULAR.description:
During the battle between Jin Kariya and Rantao, Karyia learns the origin of his powers. Rantao pleads with Kariya to use the Jokai Crest to save the Bounts and he is forced to remember his lifetime of oppression and his reasons to destroy the Soul Society. Meanwhile, Uryu has had time to heal and is on his way to join the fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inochi to Fukushuu! Ishida, Kyuukyoku no Sentaku
Life and Revenge! Ishida, the Ultimate Decision
Vie et vengeance ! Ishida, l`ultime décision
命と復讐! 石田, 究極の選択

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo arrives just in time, as Uryu and Rantao struggle to fend off Jin Kariya. Captain Hitsugaya and the others try to go after Ichigo, but Rantao stops them. She explains that there are many Jokai Crests within the Seireitei and that there is a risk they will all explode if Kariya`s Crest is released. Squad Ten informs Head Captain Yamamoto of these possible dangers and all Soul Reapers are mobilized to find and seal the remaining Crests.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Furiorosareta Yaiba! Hametsu no Shunkan
L`épée de la furie ! Le moment de la destruction
The Swung-Down Edge! The Moment of Ruin
振り下ろされた刃! 破滅の瞬間

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Kariya`s final clash begins on Sokyoku hill. Ichigo realizes that Kariya`s fighting style consists of counterattacks that rely on his incredible ability to recover. He uses Tensa Zangetsu`s speed to attack fiercely so that Kariya doesn`t have time to make a counterattack. Kariya is cornered and forced to release Messer`s hidden power in order to fight Ichigo. Messer can create electricity by causing friction in the air, and Ichigo is tossed about by the lightning that Messer produces. Meanwhile, the entire Seireitei is working to seal away all Jokai Crests on the orders of  the Head Captain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doukoku no Bount! Saigo no Gekitotsu
La lamentation du Bount ! La confrontation finale
The Wailing Bount! The Last Clash
慟哭のバウント! 最後の激突

REGULAR.description:
It has been a few days since Kariya was defeated, and all of the Jokai Crests have been sealed away. Ichigo and his friends rest until the Senkaimon is prepared so that they can return to the World of the Living. Ichigo and Renji visit the Kuchiki home to see Rukia but she hasn`t fully recovered from her fight with the Bounts. Ichigo and the others reflect on their own pasts as they talk about their experience with the Bounts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo and Rukia, Thoughts Revolving Around Heaven
Ichigo et Rukia, pensées reflétées dans le ciel
Ichigo to Rukia, Kaiten Suru Omoi
一護とルキア, 廻天する想い

REGULAR.description:
It`s back to high school and Hollow slaying for Ichigo Kurosaki, who is now officially recognized as a Substitute Soul Reaper by the Soul Society. On the day he returns to Karakura First High School, Ichigo meets an unusual new student named Shinji Hirako. That night, while Ichigo is fighting a Hollow, he is attacked by Shinji who is wielding a Zanpakuto. At that moment, several a massive amount of spiritual pressure approaches Karakura Town.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daikou Gyou Saikai! Kyoufu no Tenkousei
Les affaires reprennent ! L`étudiant qui fout les chocottes
Reopening of the Substitute Business! The Terrifying Transfer Student
代行業再開! 恐怖の転校生

REGULAR.description:
Uryu is attacked by a Menos Grande and is saved by his father, Ryuken. Ryuken defeats the Menos with a single attack. He tells Uryu that he can help him regain his powers but only under Ryuken`s conditions. Meanwhile, Kon is in Ichigo`s body and he is in trouble because he is being chased by Grand Fisher. Kon desperately tries to get away, but he is cornered in an urban area.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyougaku! Oyaji-tachi no Shoutai
Le choc ! La vraie apparence du père
Shock! The Father`s True Character
驚愕! 親父達の正体

REGULAR.description:
Isshin Kurosaki shows up in his Soul Reaper form and defeats Grand Fisher with a single strike. When Kisuke Urahara appears, Isshin and Kisuke discuss the fact that Sosuke Aizen has made contact with Hollows and is attempting to create a form of Hollows with Soul Reaper powers called Arrancars. Meanwhile, Shinji Hirako reveals that he has come to Karakura Town to recruit Ichigo into the Visoreds, a group of ex-Soul Reapers that have crossed over into the realm of the Hollows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tatakai no Hajimari, Vizard to Arrancar
The Vizards and the Arrancars
Vizards et Arrancars
戦いの始まり, 仮面の軍勢と破面

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo senses that the hollow within him is getting stronger and fears that he`ll be swallowed whole in his current state. Meanwhile, the Soul Society`s Department of Research and Development detects large amounts of spiritual pressure headed toward Karakura Town. The spiritual pressure is from fully developed Arrancars sent by Sosuke Aizen. The Arrancars begin attacking defenseless humans as soon they arrive in the World of the Living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le prélude à l`apocalypse, l`offensive des Arrancars !
Prelude to the Apocalypse, The Arrancar`s Attack!
Sekai Houkai e no Jokyoku, Arrancar Raishuu!
世界崩壊への序曲, アランカル来襲!

REGULAR.description:
Orihime and Chad are in danger and Ichigo rushes to their aid. He immediately uses his Bankai and clashes with the brutish Arrancar, Yammy. Ichigo overwhelms Yammy with his speed and forces him to draw his Zanpakuto. Just then, Ichigo`s inner Hollow takes control in an attempt to disable him from continuing the fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Reunion, Ichigo and Rukia and Shinigamis
Réunion, Ichigo, Rukia et les Shinigamis
Saikai, Ichigo to Rukia to Shinigami-tachi
再会, 一護とルキアと死神たち

REGULAR.description:
Rukia, Renji, Ikkaku, Yumichika, Captain Hitsugaya and Rangiku have come to the World of the Living and they have found Ichigo still feeling depressed about his poor performance in the fight against the Arrancars. Ichigo quickly learns that he is not going to get away with feeling sorry for himself because Rukia has plans to snap him out of his funk, even if it means she has to beat him into shape.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mission ! Les shinigamis qui sont arrivés
Mission! The Shinigami Who Came
Tokumei! Yattekita Shinigami-tachi
特命! やってきた死神たち

REGULAR.description:
Ulquiorra and Yammy have returned to the Hollow World, Hueco Mundo. They report to Sosuke Aizen and twenty other Arrancars about their fight with Ichigo and his friends. Ulquiorra has returned to Hueco Mundo without killing Ichigo and is ridiculed by his peers. Meanwhile, in the World of the Living, Captain Hitsugaya and the Advance Troops leave Ichigo`s house in search of a place to stay.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ashiki Hitomi, Aizen Futatabi
Les yeux du mal, encore Aizen
The Evil Eye, Aizen Again
悪しき瞳, 藍染再び

REGULAR.description:
The Arrancar, Grimmjow, has entered the World of the Living and he has brought a group of minions from Hueco Mundo with him. The Arrancars` goal is to kill anyone who possesses the slightest amount of spiritual pressure. Each of the bloodthirsty Arrancars sets out to find someone to destroy but they find a fight with well-trained Soul Reapers instead. Ichigo, Chad, and the Advance Troops fight hard to protect Karakura Town from the dangerous intruders.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La bataille de Rukia commence ! La lame Blanche glaçante !
Rukia Sentou Kaishi! Kooritsuku Shiroki Yaiba
Rukia`s Battle Begins! The Freezing White Blade
ルキア戦闘開始! 凍りつく白き刃

REGULAR.description:
Ikkaku and the Arrancar, Edrad, have a fierce battle in the streets of Karakura Town. Yumichika stands aside and watches because he knows that Ikkaku will be furious if he interferes. Edrad dodges Ikkaku`s wild attacks and coldly analyzes his fighting style. He determines that Ikkaku will not admit defeat unless he shows him an overpoweringly greater strength. Meanwhile, Ichigo and Rukia defeat D Roy, and take on Grimmjow, who`s spiritual pressure is like nothing they`ve ever seen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikkaku Bankai! Subete o Kudaku Chikara
Ikkaku`s Bankai! The Power that Breaks Everything
Le Bankai d`Ikkaku ! Le pouvoir qui brise tout
一角卍解! 全てを砕く力

REGULAR.description:
Ikkaku releases his Bankai, Ryumon Hozukimaru, which he has kept a secret for some time. He clashes with Edrad, who shows his true power by releasing his zanpakuto. When the two enormous spiritual pressures collide, Ikkaku is thrown to the ground. As his consciousness fades, Ikkaku remembers the time before he joined the Thirteen Court Guard Squads.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`histoire secrète de l`équipe de Zaraki ! L`homme chanceux
Team Zaraki`s Secret Story! The Lucky Men
Zaraki Tai Hiwa! Tsuiteiru Otoko-tachi
更木隊秘話! ツイている男たち

REGULAR.description:
The Soul Reapers struggle against the might of the Arrancars. Despite the Arrancar Shawlong`s overwhelming strength, Captain Hitsugaya continues his attacks. Shawlong then reveals to Hitsugaya, the existence of Arrancars far more powerful then they are, the Espada, the strongest of the Arrancars. Hitsugaya shudders when he learns that one of the Espada has come to the World of the Living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitsugaya Chiru! Kudaketa Hyourinmaru
Hitsugaya Scatters! The Broken Hyourinmaru
L`éparpillement d`Hitsugaya. Hyourinmaru brisé
日番谷散る! 砕けた氷輪丸

REGULAR.description:
The Soul Reapers receive permission from the Soul Society to use Gentei Kaijo, a spiritual pressure restriction release. Soul Reaper Captains and Lieutenants have their spiritual pressure limited when they leave the Soul Society so as not to affect the spirits of the World of the Living unnecessarily. In other words, Hitsugaya and the other Soul Reapers have been fighting the Arrancars with only a fifth of their power. The Arrancars recoil at the sudden jump in spiritual pressure and decide to retreat but the Advance Troops pursue them with their attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash ! La protection contre la souffrance
Clash! The protector vs. the Bearer
Gekitotsu! Mamoru-mono VS Koumuru-mono
激突! 護る者VS被る者

REGULAR.description:
Grimmjow is the only survivor of the Arrancars` intense battle with the Soul Reapers. He returns with Tosen to Sosuke Aizen`s palace, Las Noches in Hueco Mundo. While Aizen shows understanding towards Grimmjow`s disobedience, Tosen decides that he should still be punished for his actions. Meanwhile, having lost terribly to Grimmjow, Ichigo visits the Visored Shinji Hirako.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Vizard ! La puissance réveillée
Vizard! Mezameshi Mono-tachi no Chikara
Vizard! The Power of the Awakened
ヴァイザード! 目覚めし者たちの力

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo visits Shinji Hirako at the Visoreds` hideout in order to find out how to control his inner Hollow. He tries to get an answer by force, but Hiyori Sarugaki interrupts his battle with Shinji. Ichigo fights Hiyori while trying to suppress his inner Hollow but she is prepared to do everything she can to force him to release it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo, Complete Hollowification?!
Ichigo, Kanzen Hollow-ka!?
Ichigo, hollowfication totale ?!
一護, 完全ホロウ化!?

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo has begun training with the Visoreds in order to learn how to suppress his inner hollow. He enters his inner world and is greeted by the mirror image of himself holding a white Zangetsu. The two cross swords and release their Bankai simultaneously. Ichigo is forced to fight a more powewrful version of himself, which could be his most formidable opponent yet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash ! Bankai Noir et Bankai Blanc ?
Clash! The Black Bankai and the White Bankai
Gekitotsu! Kuroi Bankai to Shiroi Bankai
激突! 黒い卍解と白い卍解

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo has entered his inner world and is blocking fierce attacks made by another Ichigo who wields a white Zangetsu. Ichigo is cornered as images of Byakuya Kuchiki and Jin Kariya pummel him into the ground. Kenpachi Zaraki appears and tells Ichigo to be candid about his desire to fight and questions his determination. Meanwhile, Captain Hitsugaya and Rangiku are setting up a massive communication device at Orihime`s house so they can contact the Soul Society.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Annonce Urgente ! Le plan terrifiant d`Aizen
Kinkyuu Houkoku! Aizen no Osorubeki Keikaku!
Urgent Report! Aizen`s Terrifying Plan
緊急報告! 藍染の恐るべき計画

REGULAR.description:
Sosuke Aizen`s ultimate goal of killing the Soul King has been revealed. The Soul Society has learned that in order to gain access to the Royal Family`s palace, Aizen will need a key known as the Ouken. If Aizen is able to create the key, Karakura Town will be destroyed. Orihime visits Ichigo during his Visored training to inform him of this shocking discovery. Meanwhile, Uryu`s intense training to regain his Quincy powers is reaching its final stage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Uryuu VS Ryuuken! Gekitotsu Quincy Oyako
Uryuu vs. Ryuuken! Clash of the Parent-Child Quincys
Uryû vs. Ryûken ! Clash entre les Quincys père et fils
雨竜VS竜弦! 激突クインシー親子

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and his friends undergo exhaustive training in preparation for the upcoming winter showdown with Sosuke Aizen. Kisuke summons Orihime to his underground training facility where she finds Chad sparring with Renji. Meanwhile, Ulquiorra has returned to Hueco Mundo with information that peaks Aizen`s interest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La décision d`Urahara, les pensées d`Orihime
Urahara no Ketsudan, Orihime no Omoi
Urahara`s Decision, Orihime`s Thoughts
浦原の決断, 織姫の想い

REGULAR.description:
Captain Hitsugaya`s advance troops remain in Karakura Town to prepare for the showdown with Sosuke Aizen. Rangiku is fascinated by life in the world of the living, and she finds it impossible to devote her time to training. During the shopping spree of a lifetime, Rangiku`s Soul Phone alerts her of a Hollow appearance. Leaving her boy-crazy gigai behind, Rangiku arrives at the coordinates to intercept the Hollow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akumu no Arrancar! Hitsugaya-tai Shutsugeki
Le cauchemar Arrancar ! L`équipe Hitsugaya entre en jeu
Nightmare Arrancar! Team Hitsugaya Moves Out
悪夢のアランカル! 日番谷隊出撃

REGULAR.description:
Rangiku saves a young soul named Shota from being attacked by a Mock Arrancar. Believing this to be Aizen`s doing, Captain Hitsugaya decides to hold off on Shota`s soul burial to further investigate the situation. Meanwhile, the Mock Arrancar has returned and seems to be multiplying.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La descente en piquée du sombre émissaire: le mal se propage !
Maiorita Yami no Shisha! Zoushokusuru Akui
Swooping Descent of the Dark Emissary! The Propagation of Malice
舞い降りた闇の使者! 増殖する悪意

REGULAR.description:
Hitsugaya and his advanced troops learn that Shota`s little sister Yui was the Mock Arrancar`s first victim. Shota abandoned Yui out of fear and blames himself for the entire incident. Rangiku finds it suspicious that Yui appears to be fine despite having been attacked by an Arrancar. Meanwhile, Hitsugaya is in pursuit of the Mock Arrancar within the residential district when he encounters an injured soul.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invisible Enemy! Hitsugaya`s Merciless Decision
L`ennemi invisible ! La décision impitoyable de Hitsugaya
Mienai Teki! Hitsugaya, Hijou na Ketsudan
見えない敵! 日番谷, 非情な決断

REGULAR.description:
It is revealed that the Mock Arrancar gained an explosive amount of strength when it devoured Yui and has reanimated her soul to use her as bait to lure and attack human souls. While the Mock Arrancar attempts to absorb Shota`s soul, it is met with a counterstrike from Rangiku. Cornered, the Mock Arrancar continues to multiply in order to better its odds against the highly skilled advance troops.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les larmes de Rangiku, le départ douleureux du frère et de la soeur
Rangiku no Namida, Kanashiki Keimai no Wakare
Rangiku`s Tears, the Sorrowful Parting of Brother and Sister
乱菊の涙, 哀しき兄妹の別れ

REGULAR.description:
When a bullying group of middle school students refuse to give up the soccer field, Karin Kurosaki fearlessly agrees to lead her reluctant friends into a soccer match against the upperclassmen. The team that wins the game will gain the right to use the field while the losing team will have to eat the grass. With a hopeless squad of cowards on her team, Karin recruits the help of Soul Reaper Captain Toshiro Hitsugaya, who surprisingly knows a thing or two about soccer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitsugaya to Karin to Soccer Ball
Hitsugaya, Karin and Soccer Ball
Hitsugaya, Karin et le football
日番谷と夏梨とサッカーボール

REGULAR.description:
Karakura First High School`s kendo team is ambushed, and the captain and all of the main members are seriously injured. The injured team members are worried they`ll have to pull out of the regional tournament the following month, but the student body president, Kego`s sister Mizuho, suggests that they have a practice match against their attackers. With all the regulars injured, however, only the freshmen are left. Mizuho asks Ikkaku to train the remaining team members, and for some reason Ikkaku accepts the request. And so begins Ikkaku`s training from hell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikkaku l`entraîneur de Kendo
Ikkaku, Nekketsu Kendou Monogatari
Ikkaku`s Hot-Blooded Kendo Tale
一角, 熱血剣道物語

REGULAR.description:
