The Head Captain orders Mayuri Kurotsuchi to simplify the procedures to perform Gentei Kaijo, a restriction release for the Spiritual Pressure of the Advance Troops while in the World of the Living. Rin Tsubokura of the Department of Research and Development is sent to conduct some research in the World of the Living. While in the World of the Living, Rin is escorted by Hanataro Yamada and Yumichika Ayasegawa. In the middle of Rin`s research, they come across a lone soul in front of a cake shop.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le beau patissier, Yumichika !
The Beautiful Patissier, Yumichika!
Utsukushiki Patissier, Yumichika!
美しきパティシエ, 弓親!

REGULAR.description:
Kon, lonely and bored due to Rukia`s and Orihime`s absence, decides to pay a visit to Rangiku. While walking near the river, Rangiku and Kon witness a young girl fall off a bridge when she tries to save her stuffed animal. In order to rescue the girl, Miyuki, Rangiku takes Kon`s soul candy out of his body and throws it into the mouth of the stuffed animal that Miyuki dropped. Kon finds that his duties as the girl`s savior are a little more than he bargained for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hakarareta, Kon! Rangiku wa Mite Ita..
Kon est dupé ! Rangiku sous surveillance
Kon is Deceived! Rangiku on the Lookout..
はかられた, コン! 乱菊は見ていた..

REGULAR.description:
Trouble is brewing in Las Noches, Aizen`s palace in the Hollow realm, Hueco Mundo. One of the Arrancars, Patras, rebels against Aizen and tries to steal the Hogyoku. Ulquiorra realizes what Patras is up to, but he is defeated when he is caught off-guard by Menis and Aldegor, who assist Patros in his rebellion. Upon obtaining the Hogyoku, the three go to the World of the Living, where they head to Urahara`s shop in order to find Kisuke Urahara, the creator of the Hogyoku.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Civil War in Hueco Mondo! Ulquiorra`s Death
Guerre civile à l`Hueco Mundo ! La mort d`Ulquiorra
Hueco Mundo no Nairan! Ulquiorra no Shi
ウェコムンドの内乱! ウルキオラの死

REGULAR.description:
Renji`s fight with Patras continues as it destroys Urahara`s shop and parts of Karakura Town. Repeatedly overpowered by Patras`s attacks, Renji leads the Arrancar into Urahara`s underground training facility where he can safely use his Bankai. Meanwhile, Hitsugaya and the others engage Menis and Aldegor while the Arrancars are in their released state.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akui no Tatakai, Aizen no Wana
Battle of Bad Faith, Aizen`s Trap
La Bataille Malveillante, le piège d`Aizen
悪意の戦い, 藍染の罠

REGULAR.description:
There are only a few months left until the showdown with the Arrancars. Ichigo continues to train with the Visoreds, but the amount of time in which he can remain Hollowfied hasn`t increased by much. In the Soul Society, Rukia and Orihime have also been undergoing rigorous training. Ukitake happily watches the two and is pleased that Rukia finally has friends. Sosuke Aizen may have plans to cut their training short as he calls on his Espada.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deuxième déplacement du Hueco Mundo ! Hitsugaya vs Yammy
Hueco Mundo Saidou! Hitsugaya vs Yammy
Second Move of Hueco Mundo! Hitsugaya vs Yammy
ウェコムンド再動! 日番谷vsヤミー

REGULAR.description:
Arrancars suddenly appear in the World of the Living. Yammy, Luppi, Grimmjow, and Wonderweiss are confronted by Hitsugaya`s advance troops and Ichigo. Ichigo fights Grimmjow and immediately uses his Bankai. Meanwhile, Luppi, the newest Espada Number Six, takes on Hitsugaya and his troops by himself. He releases his Zanpakuto and knocks down Hitsugaya with the tremendous force of his eight tentacles. His tentacles then set their sights on Rangiku, Ikkaku, and Yumichika.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo VS Grimmjow, Juuichibyou no Tatakai!
Ichigo vs Grimmjow, 11 Seconds Battle!
Ichigo vs Grimmjow, La bataille de 11 secondes !
一護VSグリムジョー, 11秒の戦い!

REGULAR.description:
Hitsugaya`s advance troops continue to fight the Arrancars who appeared in Karakura Town. Urahara shows up to help. He dodges Wonderweiss, but Yammy hits him with a flurry of Bala attacks. Meanwhile, Rangiku, Ikkaku and Yumichika are having trouble fighting Espada Number Six, Luppi, who has released his zanpakuto. And on the other side of town Ichigo has cornered Grimmjow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le projet d`Ulquiorra, le moment où le soleil se lève !
Sakubou no Ulquiorra, Taiyou ga Shizumu Toki
Ulquiorra`s Scheme, the Moment When the Sun Sets
策謀のウルキオラ, 太陽が沈む時

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and his friends manage to drive away Grimmjow and the other Arrancars. But behind the scenes, Aizen orders Ulquiorra to bring Orihime to Hueco Mundo. Orihime agrees to go in exchange for the safety of her friends. She is given a twelve-hour reprieve and is allowed to say her farewells to only one person. Orihime prepares herself and leaves her room to say goodbye to the one person she has in mind. Meanwhile, Hitsugaya and the others are recovering from the injuries they received from their fight with the Arrancars.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu..., Kurosaki-kun !
Goodbye..., Kurosaki
Sayonara..., Kurosaki-kun
さよなら..., 黒崎くん

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo awakens to realize that the serious injuries he received from Grimmjow`s attack have completely healed. He senses that Orihime came to his room from the traces of Spiritual Pressure that she left behind. Hitsugaya comes to get Ichigo, and they head to Orihime`s room. Ichigo senses that something is odd when he sees Rukia and the others gathered there. A transmission comes in from the Soul Society and Captain Ukitake appears on the monitor. He tells them the terrifying truth: that Orihime is with the Arrancars and may already be dead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genmei! Inoue Orihime no Kyujutsu o Kinzu
Ordre strict ! Interdiction de sauver Inoue Orihime
Strict Order! The Forbidden Rescue of Inoue Orihime
厳命! 井上織姫ノ救出ヲ禁ズ

REGULAR.description:
Orihime has been kidnapped by Sosuke Aizen and the Arrancars. Ichigo decides to go to Hueco Mundo in order to save her. He visits Urahara`s shop and finds Uryu and Chad waiting for him. They have both finished their training and are ready to join Ichigo in the rescue of Orihime. Meanwhile, in Hueco Mundo, Orihime is brought before Aizen in his palace, Las Noches.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukkatsu no Grimmjow
La renaissance de Grimmjow
Revival of Grimmjow
復活のグリムジョー

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo, Uryu, and Chad charge through the Garganta and into Hueco Mundo. There, they find themselves in a large corridor. They set off deeper into the building to search for Orihime, but as they move further down the corridor they find many traps left for them by the Arrancars.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ishida, Chad, Atarashiki Chikara no Taidou
Ishida, Chad, the Quickening of a New Power
Ishida-Chad, l`accélération d`un nouveau pouvoir
石田・チャド, 新しき力の胎動

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and his friends defeat the Arrancars Iceringer and Demora, whom they meet in underground corridor 22. They escape the underground just as it begins to crumble and come out onto the surface of Hueco Mundo. It is a world of night and white sand. They immediately find Aizen`s palace, Las Noches, and are awed by its size. Meanwhile, Aizen calls a meeting with all of the Espada.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Espada Shuuketsu! Aizen no Gozen Kaigi
L`Espada se réunit ! L`assemblée royale d`Aizen
The Espada Gather! Aizen`s Royal Assembly
エスパーダ集結! 藍染の御前会議

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and his friends save a girl who is being attacked by mysterious Arrancars. The girl is also an Arrancar, named Nel, and as it turns out, she was only playing tag with her Arrancar friends, Pesche and Dondochakka. Nel and her friends are oddly cheery, but when they realize that Ichigo is a Soul Reaper, they worry that Aizen will scold them for letting their enemies roam freely.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Her Name is Nel! The Appearance of the Strange Arrancar
Son nom est Nell ! L`apparence de l`étrange arrancar
Sono Na wa Nel! Fushigi na Arrancar Toujou
その名はネル! 不思議なアランカル登場

REGULAR.description:
In a second attempt to defeat Runuganga, the Guardian of the White Sands, Rukia uses Sodenoshirayuki, but her attack backfires when she accidentally stabs Bawabawa in the back. Startled by his injury, Bawabawa begins flailing and sends Rukia flying through the air. Ichigo and his friends are swallowed by the desert of Hueco Mundo and fall into the Menos Forest, home of the Menos.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Forêt de Menos ! La recherche de la disparue Rukia
Menos no Mori! Kieta Rukia o Sagase!
The Forest of Menos! The Search for the Missing Rukia
メノスの森! 消えたルキアを探せ!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and his friends have fallen into the Menos Forest. They fight off attacks from Gillians while they look for Rukia and Nel, who have been separated from the group. Rukia is hiding out of harm`s way with a mysterious Soul Reaper named Ashido, and Nel was taken away by a group of Hollows. Just as Rukia and Ashido notice a drop in Ichigo`s Spiritual Pressure, they sense something else in the forest approaching.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ashido, Kako kara Kita Shinigami
Ashido, the Shinigami Who Came from the Past
Le shinigami qui venait du passé
アシド, 過去から来た死神

REGULAR.description:
Ashido and Rukia continue to battle Pequenos, one of the Adjuchas who controls the Menos Forest. Pequenos attacks at full strength to try to end the long-shared enmity between him and Ashido. Meanwhile, Ichigo, Chad, Uryu, and Renji follow Nel and her friends` Spiritual Pressure to the depths of the Menos Forest. They find that Nel and her friends have been captured. At that moment, they are surrounded by a tremendous number of Gillians.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuzure Iku Mori, Hyuakuman no Menos
L`effondrement de la forêt
Through the Crumbling Forest, a Million Menos
崩れ行く森, 百万のメノス

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and his friends arrive at Las Noches, Aizen`s stronghold, where they break through a wall and charge into the palace. Ichigo tries to leave Nel behind, but she follows Ichigo into the palace and cries as she chases after him. At first Ichigo ignores her, but when he finally gives in, Nel suddenly disappears. In the darkness, Ichigo and his friends search the area where they last heard Nel`s voice and find a hole that leads underground.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chikai! Futatabi Ikite Kono Basho e
Oath! Back Here Alive Again
Revenir ici vivant
誓い! 再び生きてこの場所へ

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo, Uryu, Chad, Rukia, and Renji go their separate ways down the corridors of Las Noches and vow to safely reunite. Ichigo heads down a pathway on his own, but he is followed by Nel. He has no choice but to allow her to join him in order to keep her safe. Suddenly, he senses someone`s Spiritual Pressure. An Arrancar named Dordoni stands in Ichigo and Nel`s way. Dordoni is Espada Number 103 and doesn`t appear to be very strong. Ichigo unenthusiastically accepts his challenge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukiareru Boufuu! Odoru Arrancar to no Souguu
La tempête hurlante ! Rencontre avec l`Arrancar dansant
The Raging Storm! Encounter with the Dancing Arrancar
吹き荒れる暴風! 踊るアランカルとの遭遇

REGULAR.description:
Dordoni the Arrancar is a Privaron Espada, a former Espada. Ichigo underestimates his strength and is quickly driven into a corner when Dordoni releases his Zanpakuto. Dordoni pushes Ichigo and demands to see his Bankai, but Ichigo refuses. He wants to fight Dordoni as he is in order to conserve his strength. Dordoni loses his temper and releases the blast of a massive Cero at Ichigo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo Hangeki! Koitsu ga Ore no Bankai Da
Ichigo Strikes Back! This is my Bankai
Ichigo riposte ! Voici mon bankai
一護反撃! こいつが俺の卍解だ

REGULAR.description:
Dordoni makes a final attempt to win his battle, but he is defeated by a Hollowfied Ichigo. As Ichigo and Nel continue on their way to Las Noches, the Exequias, Hueco Mundo`s execution squad, arrive to finish off Ichigo. Meanwhile, Uryu and Chad also move into the Privaron Espada area and begin fierce battles with triple-digit Arrancars.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma no Kenkyuu! Szayel Aporro no Takurami
Recherche diabolique ! Le plan de Szayel Aporro
The Devilish Research! Szayel Aporro`s Plan
悪魔の研究! ザエルアポロの企み

REGULAR.description:
In the depths of Las Noches, Rukia encounters Ninth Espada Aaroniero Arruruerie in an area with a blue sky. Aaroniero lures Rukia into a room and removes his mask. Underneath his mask is the face of Kaien Shiba, the former Thirteenth Squad Lieutenant who is supposed to be dead. Rukia is confused, but Kaien talks with her as if nothing happened. Kaien explains that because of the ability of the Hollow that took control of him right before he died, he was thrust into Hueco Mundo, where he was reborn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rukia and Kaien, the Sorrowful Reunion
Rukia et Kaien ! Réunion douloureuse !
Rukia to Kaien, Kanashimi no Saikai
ルキアと海燕, 哀しみの再会

REGULAR.description:
Rukia is angered when Kaien tells her to hand over her friends in return for letting her go and is convinced that this Kaien is a fake. She attacks Kaien with every technique she knows, but he dodges them all. Kaien claims that he knows all about Rukia`s ability because he`s the real Kaien. When he releases his Zanpakuto, Nejibana, Rukia struggles to believe that this person could actually be her former lieutenant.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rukia Hangeki! Kesshi no Kidou o Hanate
Rukia Retaliates! Release the Desperate Kidou
Rukia riposte ! Le Kidou désespéré
ルキア反撃! 決死の鬼道を放て

REGULAR.description:
Uryu is having a tough time fighting against Privaron Espada Cirucci, whose whip attacks are ever changing. Pesche, who has come looking for Nel, stumbles upon Uryu`s fight with Cirucci instead. Pesche attempts to run away in terror but is distracted when his eye catches the miniskirt of Cirucci who is standing on a high pillar.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ishida & Pesshe, Yuujou no Gattai Kougeki
Ishida & Pesshe, the United Attack of Friendship
Ishida et Pesche, l`attaque unifiée de l`amitié
石田&ペッシェ, 友情の合体攻撃

REGULAR.description:
Pesche`s unusual ability allows Uryu to damage Cirucci. Cirucci releases her Zanpakuto and attacks the two until she has them cornered. Uryu uses Seeleschneider, the only bladed Quincy weapon, to counter her attacks as they get closer and closer. With Seeleschneider Uryu is able to cut through Cirucci`s feathers. Figuring that her attacks will no longer that work against Uryu, Cirucci does something unexpected
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ishida no Kirifuda, Tamashii o Kirisaku Mono
Ishida`s Trump Card, Seele Schneider
L`atout d`Ishida, Le Faucheur d`Âmes
石田の切り札, 魂を切り裂くもの

REGULAR.description:
Chad faces the Privaron Espada Gantenbainne and survives many of his fierce attacks. Chad reveals the power of his right arm, Brazo Derecho Del Gigante. Ever since he entered Hueco Mundo, Chad has sensed that his powers are closer to that of a Hollow`s rather than a Soul Reaper or a Quincy. Cornered, Gantenbainne releases his Zanpakuto to defend against Chad`s powerful attacks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bras droit du Géant, Bras gauche du Diable
Kyojin no Uwan, Akuma no Sawan
Right Arm of the Giant, Left Arm of the Devil
巨人の右腕, 悪魔の左腕

REGULAR.description:
Nnoitra, one of the Espada, suddenly appears and defeats Chad in a single strike. Ichigo, Uryu, and Renji sense Chad`s Spiritual Pressure grow weaker, but they are too far away to help him. Orihime, who is still being held by the Arrancars, also senses Chad`s Spiritual Pressure. At that moment, Ulquiorra enters Orihime`s room and informs her that her friends will soon perish.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sado Yasutora Dies! Orihime`s Tears
Sado Yasutora Shisu! Orihime no Namida
Yasutora Sado meurt ! Les larmes d`Orihime
茶渡泰虎死す! 織姫の涙

REGULAR.description:
Aaroniero has the ability to utilize the Spiritual Pressure of the Hollows that he devours. He devoured the body of the Hollow Metastacia that fused itself with Lieutenant Kaien Shiba before it died. Now he uses his power to gain its memory and abilities. Rukia, who is the Soul Reaper responsible for bringing down Metastacia while it was possessing Kaien`s body, is shocked to see her former lieutenant before her. As Aaroniero releases his Zanpakuto, Rukia struggles to find the will to defend against his attacks
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Testament - Ton cœur est ici
Testament, Your Heart is Right Here...
Yuigon, Kokoro wa Koko ni...
遺言, 心は此処に...

REGULAR.description:
Renji meets Espada Number Eight, Szayel Aporro Grantz. Renji attempts to use his Bankai but fails because of restrictions that Szayel Aporro has placed on the room they are in that limit Renji`s power. Szayel Aporro has extensive information on Renji`s abilities. He plans to capture Renji unharmed so he can conduct further research on him. Meanwhile, all of the Espada in Las Noches are informed that Rukia defeated Espada Number Nine, Aaroniero.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le cruel arrancar, la provocation d`Ulquiorra
The Cruel Arrancar, Ulquiorra`s Provocation
Zankoku na Arrancar, Ulquiorra no Chouhatsu
残酷な破面, ウルキオラの挑発

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Ulquiorra begin to fight in the depths of Las Noches. Ichigo fights Ulquiorra at full power right from the start, using his Bankai and even his Hollowfication. Ulquiorra is overwhelmed by his great strength, but strategically retaliates when Ichigo removes his Hollow`s mask. Meanwhile, Renji`s Bankai is sealed away as he fights Szayel Aporro. Szayel Aporro continues to have a home-field advantage as he effortlessly blocks Renji`s attacks and calls on some of his subordinates
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le rire de Szayel Aporro, Renji complètement piégé
Szayel Aporro Laughs, The Net Trapping Renji is Complete
Warau Szayel Aporro, Renji Houimou Kansei
笑うザエルアポロ, 恋次包囲網完成

REGULAR.description:
Lolly and Menoly are jealous that Aizen is treating Orihime well, so they go to Orihime`s room to harass her. Orihime tries to stay strong, but they are relentless. At that moment, Grimmjow comes to Orihime`s room. Meanwhile, Uryu comes to help Renji, and joins the fight against Szayel Aporro. Uryu takes advantage of an opening and pierces Szayel Aporro with Seeleschneider`s blade. Szayel Aporro collapses, but Uryu is shocked when Seeleschneider suddenly disappears.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinigami and Quincy, the Battle with Madness
Shinigami et Quincy, la folie de la bataille
Shinigami to Quincy, Kyouki to no Tatakai
死神とクインシー, 狂気との戦い

REGULAR.description:
Szayel Aporro has analyzed Uryu`s and Renji`s Spiritual Pressures and has sealed away most of their abilities. The two decide to work together. Uryu says that he has a plan if Renji can stall Szayel Aporro for twenty seconds. Renji agrees and charges in, but Szayel Aporro easily deflects Zabimaru`s attacks. Meanwhile, Ichigo has been defeated by Ulquiorra and has lost consciousness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ishida no Sakusen! Koubou no Nijuubyou
Ishida`s Strategy, the 20-second Offense and Defense
La stratégie d`Ishida, les 20 secondes d`attaque-défense
石田の作戦! 攻防の20秒

REGULAR.description:
Grimmjow takes Orihime without permission and forces her to heal Ichigo. He wants to settle things with Ichigo while he`s in his best condition. But before Ichigo`s wounds heal, Ulquiorra comes when he realizes what`s going on. Ulquiorra stops Ichigo`s healing and demands that Grimmjow hand Orihime over to him. Grimmjow refuses and attacks Ulquiorra. The clashing Spiritual Pressures of the two Espada shake Las Noches.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bouillantes intentions meurtrières ! La joie de Grimmjow
Satsui Futtou! Kanki no Grimmjow
The Murderous Intent Boils! The Joyful Grimmjow
殺意沸騰! 歓喜のグリムジョー

REGULAR.description:
A wild battle begins between Ichigo and Grimmjow. As swords and Spiritual Pressures clash, Grimmjow unleashes his strongest Cero, the Gran Rey Cero. Orihime and Nel are about to be caught in the attack, so Ichigo Hollowfies in order to save them. Grimmjow shouts for joy when faced with Ichigo`s power. He releases his Zanpakuto and shows his most powerful form. Orihime watches as the battle rages on. She becomes frightened when she compares Ichigo`s ominous Spiritual Pressure to that of her brother who became a Hollow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Desperate Effort VS Desperate Effort! The Hollowized Ichigo
Effort désespéré contre effort désespéré ! La Hollowmorphose d`Ichigo
Shiryoku VS Shiryoku! Hollow-ka Shita Ichigo
死力VS死力! ホロウ化した一護

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo hits Grimmjow with a mighty blow. Grimmjow is about to collapse, but he grabs Zangetsu and pulls himself up. He begins to remember his time as an Adjucha, a Hollow that has an extreme hunger for souls. They continue to obsessively devour souls until they reach the level of Gillians, and then finally they become Adjuchas. But those who become Adjuchas have the fear of degenerating. If they don`t continue to consume Hollows, they will degenerate into Gillians. Grimmjow continues to attack his fellow Hollows until he meets an interesting band of Adjuchas.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kecchaku no Toki, Grimmjow no Saigo
Le temps de la conclusion, la fin de Grimmjow
The Moment of Conclusion, the End of Grimmjow
決着の時, グリムジョーの最後

REGULAR.description:
A new captain joins Squad 3, taking the place of the rebel Gin Ichimaru. His name is Shusuke Amagai.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le nouveau capitaine apparait ! Son nom est Shûsuke Amagai
Shin Taichou Toujou! Sono Na wa Amagai Shuusuke
The New Captain Appears! His name is Amagai Shuusuke
新隊長登場! その名は天貝繍助

REGULAR.description:
In the middle of the night, a strange Senkaimon opens in Karakura Town, and a mysterious team of three arrives in the World of the Living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: New Development, the Dangerous Transfer Student Appears!
Nouveau développement ! Un dangereux étudiant transféré apparaît !
Shin Tenkai, Kiken na Tenkousei Arawaru!
新展開, 危険な転校生現る!

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious team of three transfers into Ichigo’s class. Their names are Rurichiyo Kasumiohji, Kenryu, and Enryu. Rurichiyo acts like a princess, and Kenryu and Enryu obsessively guard her surroundings.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Desperate Struggle Under the Moonlit Night, the Mysterious Assassin and Zanpakutou
Lutte désespérée sous le clair de lune. l`assassin mystérieux et son Zanpakutô
Tsukiyo no Shitou, Nazo no Shikaku to Zanpakutou
月夜の死闘, 謎の刺客と斬魄刀

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Rukia assume the responsibility of being Rurichiyo’s bodyguard. It is Rurichiyo’s first time in the World of the Living, and she asks Ichigo to teach her about everything she sees.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kenryu, la profusion des florissantes fleurs cramoisies
Kenryuu, Sakimidareru Beni no Hana
Kenryuu, the Profusion of Blooming Crimson Flowers
犬龍, 咲き乱れる紅の華

REGULAR.description:
Since welcoming Shusuke Amagai as the new captain, Squad 3 has been hard at work. But the duties Shusuke assigns them are tasks that one couldn’t imagine a Soul Reaper doing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kibune Goes to War! The Violent Wind that Rages
Kibune Shutsujin! Fukiareru Reppuu
Kifune part en guerre ! Le vent violent fait rage !
貴船出陣! 吹き荒れる烈風

REGULAR.description:
One morning, Rurichiyo suddenly disappears. Kenryu finds some indication that leads him to believe that she used the Kasumiohji Clan’s private Senkaimon to return to the Soul Society.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoaku no Toujou! Kasumioojike no Yami
L`apparition du grand mal ! Les ténèbres dans la maison de Kasumiôji !
The Appearance of the Great Evil! The Darkness in the House of Kasumiooji
巨悪の登場! 霞大路家の闇

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo returns to the World of the Living, and he draws up a countermeasure at Kisuke Urahara’s shop. When everyone leaves Urahara’s shop, they come across Hanza Nukui, the head of an assassination squad.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brise la limite du miroir ! La captivité d`Ichigo
Captured Ichigo, Shatter the Mirror`s Barrier!
Torawareta Ichigo, Kagami no Kekkai o Yabure!
囚われた一護, 鏡の結界を破れ!

REGULAR.description:
Hanza Nukui has misjudged the power of Ichigo and his friends, and has failed to assassinate Rurichiyo. He forms a unit of assassins, armed with powerful Bakkouto swords, and prepares to go back to the World of the Living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukushuu no Shikaku, Nerawareta Ichigo
La vengeance de l`assassin. Ichigo est ciblé
The Revenging Assassin, Ichigo is Targeted
復讐の刺客, 狙われた一護

REGULAR.description:
Hanza Nukui and his team of assassins, armed with Bakkoutos, arrive in the World of the Living, and they challenge Ichigo and the others to fight. Jinnai Douko appears before Rurichiyo wielding a Bakkouto.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaiki! Katana o Kuu Ansatsusha
Mystery! The Sword-Consuming Assassin
Mystère ! L`épée qui consummait l`assassin
怪奇! 刀を喰う暗殺者

REGULAR.description:
The respective battles of Rukia, Uryu, and Chad continue. Jinnai Douko becomes one with his Bakkouto, Retsurai, and keeps attacking. Rukia has a tough battle against Jinnai, whose whole body transforms into a weapon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyakuten no Rukia! Bousousuru Katana
Le retour de Rukia ! La lame qui se déchaîne !
The Reversal of Rukia, the Rampaging Blade
逆転のルキア! 暴走する刀

REGULAR.description:
Hanza Nukui uses his Bakkouto, Saiga’s weak point, to act as a trap for Ichigo. Ichigo ends up getting caught in Hanza’s scheme, an expanse of mirrors. The mirrors take the memories of the captive and turn them into nightmares.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le cauchemar révélé. Ichigo à l`intérieur du miroir
Miserareta Akumu, Kagami no Naka no Ichigo
The Nightmare Which is Shown, Ichigo`s Inside the Mirror
見せられた悪夢, 鏡の中の一護

REGULAR.description:
At a captain’s meeting in the Soul Society, Shusuke Amagai proposes to the Thirteen Court Guard Squads that they train directly with the squads.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Confrontation !? Amagai contre les treize Divisons
Confrontation?! Amagai vs. Gotei 13
Tairitsu!? Amagai VS Gotei Juusan Tai
対立!? 天貝VS護廷十三隊

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and his friends have narrowly escaped Hanza Nukui’s team’s attacks. But Uryu and Chad have been inundated with the Spirit Energy of Bakkoutos, and Orihime’s healing power doesn’t seem to be working.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hime no Ketsui, Kanashiki Hanayome
La décision de la princesse. La mariée affligée
The Princess` Decision, the Sorrowful Bride
姫の決意, 哀しき花嫁

REGULAR.description:
Rurichiyo has gone back to the Soul Society to take back control of the Kasumiohji Clan. Ichigo, Rukia, Kenryu, and Enryu follow her through the Senkaimon, and they barge in on Rurichiyo and Shu’s wedding at the Kasumiohji palace.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le déploiement de la 2e Division ! Ichigo est encerclé
Niban Tai Shutsugeki! Houisareta Ichigo
The 2nd Division Sorties! Ichigo is Surrounded
二番隊出撃! 包囲された一護

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Rukia are being chased down by the Thirteen Court Guard Squads after sabotaging Rurichiyo and Shu’s wedding and taking Shu hostage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amagai no Jitsuryoku, Zanpakutou Kaihou!
Amagai`s True Strength, the Released Zanpakutou!
La véritable force d`Amagai. Le Zanpakuto est libéré !
天貝の実力, 斬魄刀解放!

REGULAR.description:
After Shu Kannogi tearfully tells Shusuke Amagai how he feels, Shusuke loses his feelings of ill will towards Ichigo and instead decides to help in their search for Rurichiyo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`obscurité se déplace ! Le vrai visage de Kibune
The Darkness Which Moves! Kibune`s True Colors
Ugokidashita Yami! Kibune no Shoutai
動き出した闇! 貴船(きぶね)の正体

REGULAR.description:
The Soul Reapers stop chasing after Ichigo for the time being and focus on restoring order in the Seireitei.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kira and Kibune, Offense and Defense of 3rd Division
Kira et Kibune, l`attaque et la défense de la 3e Division
Kira to Kibune, Sanban Tai no Koubou
吉良と貴船, 三番隊の攻防

REGULAR.description:
The intense battle between Izuru Kira and Makoto Kibune continues at Squad Three’s training facility.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Glace et Flamme ! La Lutte féroce : Amagai contre Hitsugaya !
Ice and Flame! Fierce Fight of Amagai vs. Hitsugaya
Koori to Honoo! Amagai VS Hitsugaya no Gekitou
氷と炎! 天貝VS日番谷の激闘

REGULAR.description:
At the Head Captain’s command, all the Soul Reapers of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads break into the Kasumiohji Clan’s palace at once.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ordre de sortie ! Supprimez la maison de Kasumiôji
Shutsugeki Shirei! Kasumioojike o Seiatsu Seyo
Sortie Orders! Suppress the House of Kasumiooji
出撃指令! 霞大路家を制圧せよ

REGULAR.description:
The battle at the Kasumiohji Clan’s palace between the Thirteen Court Guard Squads and the Kasumiohji Clan’s assassins continues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo Gekido! Ansatsusha no Himitsu
Ichigo Rages! The Assassin`s Secret
Ichigo fait rage ! Le secret de l`assassin
一護激怒! 暗殺者の秘密

REGULAR.description:
The chaos in the Kasumiohji Clan was all a scheme formulated by Shusuke Amagai. Shusuke joined the Thirteen Court Guard Squads in order to avenge his father’s death at the hands of Head Captain Yamamoto.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel ! Amagai contre Ichigo !
Duel! Amagai vs. Ichigo
Kettou! Amagai VS Ichigo
決闘! 天貝VS一護

REGULAR.description:
Shusuke Amagai wields both a Bakkouto, which seals the powers of Soul Reapers, and his Bankai, Raika Gouenkaku. Ichigo defends against Shusuke`s Bankai while Hollowfied and counterattacks with his most powerful Getsugatensho.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fierté du Shinigami tombé
Ochita Shinigami no Hokori
The Fallen Shinigami`s Pride
堕ちた死神の誇り

REGULAR.description:
The Hueco Mundo Arc, which was put on hold for the New Captain Shusuke Amagai Arc, resumes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc Hueco Mundo : Reprise !
Hueco Mundo Chapter, Restart!
Hueco Mundo Hen, Saikai!
ウェコムンド編, 再開!

REGULAR.description:
Uryu and Renji thought they had escaped, but they find themselves back at Szayelaporro`s palace.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyouen, Szayel Aporro Gekijou
Le banquet effrayant. Le théâtre de Szayel Aporro
Szayel Aporro`s Theater
恐宴, ザエルアポロ劇場

REGULAR.description:
After finding Nel hiding in the shadow of a rock, Nnoitora tells Ichigo`s group that Nel is actually a former Espada.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nel no Himitsu, Kyonyuu Bijo Sansen!?
The Secret of Nel
Une beauté participe à la bataille, le secret de Nell ?!
ネルの秘密, 巨乳美女参戦!?

REGULAR.description:
Uryu and Renji continue fighting their clones. But no matter how many times they beat them, the clones turn back into liquid, multiply, and revive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`irrésistible spectacle de marionnettes de terreur
Teikou Funou, Kyoufu no Ningyougeki
The Irresistable, Puppet Show of Terror
抵抗不能, 恐怖の人形劇

REGULAR.description:
Nnoitora and Nelliel continue to battle. They are nearly equal in strength. The two of them used to fight side by side as fellow Espadas.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le passé de Nell
Neliel no Kako
Neliel`s Past
ネリエルの過去

REGULAR.description:
Nelliel regains her memory, and Pesche and Dondochakka realize that she is going to give her all in the battle against Nnoitora. In order to go fight with Nelliel, Pesche and Dondochakka summon all their strength.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`union ultime! Le sérieux de Pesche
Pesche no Honki
Pesche`s Seriousness
ペッシェの本気

REGULAR.description:
Just when Nelliel and Nnoitora`s battle is about to come to an end, something unexpected happens to Nelliel`s body. Ichigo`s group find themselves in a sticky situation yet again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La plus forte armée des Shinigamis apparaît !
Saikyou Shinigami Gundan Toujou
The Strongest Shinigami Army Appears
最強死神軍団登場

REGULAR.description:
Byakuya visits Rukia, who is unconscious after being injured in the battle against Aaroniero Arruruerie. Zommari Rureaux, Espada Number 7, happens to be there, attempting to finish her off.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya Bankai, Shizukanaru Ikari
Byakuya`s Bankai, the Quiet Anger
Le Bankai de Byakuya. La colère tranquille
白哉卍解, 静かなる怒り

REGULAR.description:
Zommari`s technique, "Amor," takes control over anything its eyes gaze upon. He uses this power to control Rukia`s body and use her as a shield.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 2人の科学者, マユリの罠
Futari no Kagakusha, Mayuri no Wana
Les deux scientifiques. Le piège de Mayuri
The Two Scientists, Mayuri`s Trap

REGULAR.description:
Szayelaporro is exasperated when his powers don`t work at all against Mayuri Kurotsuchi, and he ends up being enveloped by Mayuri`s Konjiki Ashisogijizo. Just then, something happens to Nemu, who was being held hostage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sainte naissance. La résurrection de Szayel Aporro
The Resurrecting Szayel Aporro
Yomigaeru Szayel Aporro
蘇るザエルアポロ

REGULAR.description:
Szayelaporro used his prisoner Nemu as a medium to come back to life. However, Nemu`s body is permeated with the new medicine that Mayuri developed. Szayelaporro experiences the dreadful effects of the medicine himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le corps le plus dur?! Nnoitra se met en colère
Nnoitra is Cut Down
Nnoitra o Kire
ノイトラを斬れ

REGULAR.description:
Kenpachi goes after Nnoitora`s eye and pierces his eye patch, but the eye patch was hiding a dreadful secret.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nnoitra Kaihou! Zoushoku Shita Ude
Nnoitra Releases! The Multiplying Arms
Nnoitra libéré! La prolifération des armes
ノイトラ解放! 増殖した腕

REGULAR.description:
When Kenpachi`s eye patch comes off, releasing his Spiritual Pressure and true strength, Nnoitora invokes his sword attack, Santa Teresa.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conclusion de violents combats ! Qui est le plus fort ?
Fierce Fighting Conclusion! Who`s the Strongest
Gekitou Kecchaku! Saikyou wa Dare Da
激闘決着! 最強は誰だ

REGULAR.description:
Nnoitora has never shown any mercy to his opponents, and he has always finished them off. Nnoitora`s reason for fighting has always been purely to fight. He has been fighting and becoming stronger, hoping to someday die in battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aizen VS Shinigami
Aizen vs. Shinigami
Réunion à Karakura ! Aizen contre les Shinigamis !
藍染VS死神

REGULAR.description:
Rurichiyo Kasumiohji, who supposedly became the head of the family, goes off to the World of the Living by herself after getting in a fight with Kenryu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo no Seppuku Settoku Sakusen
Ichigo`s Seppuku Persuasion Strategy
Le Seppuku d`Ichigo ! Stratégie de persuasion
一護の切腹説得作戦

REGULAR.description:
Rurichiyo and Kenryu`s fight was over how to revitalize the Kasumiohji Clan. Rurichiyo is concerned about the low spirits of her people, and she wants to host a soccer tournament.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doki! Hollow Darake no Kemari Taikai
Fureur ! Le tournoi de football des Shinigamis !
Thump! The Football Tournament of Hollows
ドキ! 虚だらけの蹴鞠大会

REGULAR.description:
In the Soul Society 110 years ago, the Thirteen Court Guard Squads are made up of unfamiliar faces. The captain of Squad Five is the masked Visored, Shinji Hirako who currently resides in the World of the Living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das vergangene Kapitel beginnt! Die Wahrheit von vor 110 Jahren
Kako Hen Kaishi! 110 Nen Mae no Shinjitsu
Le chapitre du passé commence! La vérité, 110 ans plus tôt
The Past Chapter Begins! The Truth from 110 Years Ago
過去編開始! 110年前の真実

REGULAR.description:
Kisuke Urahara replaces the newly promoted Kirio Hikifune as captain of Squad Twelve. Hiyori Sarugaki, lieutenant of Squad Twelve, cannot hide her dissatisfaction with the new captain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 12th Division`s New Captain, Urahara Kisuke
Der neue Kommandant der 12. Einheit - Kisuke Urahara
Juu-Ni-Ban Tai Shin Taichou, Urahara Kisuke
Le nouveau capitaine de la 12e division, Urahara Kisuke
十二番隊新隊長, 浦原喜助

REGULAR.description:
Kisuke takes Hiyori to the Special underground Confinement Unit inside the Squad Two barracks. Nicknamed the Maggot`s Nest, this place imprisons enlisted Thirteen Court Guard Squad members whose beliefs or actions have been deemed dangerous.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aizen and the Boy Genius
Aizen et le petit génie
Aizen to Tensai Shounen
Aizen und der geniale Junge
藍染と天才少年

REGULAR.description:
Nine years have passed since Kisuke Urahara was appointed captain of Squad Twelve. Bizarre deaths start to occur in the Rukon District where people disappear, leaving only their clothes behind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Muguruma Kyuu-Ban Tai, Shutsudou Seyo
Muguruma de la 9e division part
Muguruma`s 9th Division, Sets Out
Mugurumas 9. Einheit rückt aus
六車九番隊, 出動せよ

REGULAR.description:
Kensei Muguruma`s and Mashiro Kuna`s Spiritual Pressure disappears. The Seireitei deems this a dire situation. Kisuke Urahara, who sent Hiyori to Squad Nine, volunteers to go to the scene of their disappearance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiyori Dies? The Beginning of Tragedy
Hiyori Shisu? Higeki no Hajimari
Hiyori meurt ? Le début de la tragédie
Stirbt Hiyori? Der Beginn einer Tragödie
ひよ里死す? 悲劇の始まり

REGULAR.description:
At Squad Nine`s camp, Shinji Hirako and the others run into Kensei Muguruma, who is donning a strange mask. Kensei starts to attack them, and he is too powerful to stop even with all of them combined.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Betrayal! Aizen`s Secret Maneuvers
Trahison ! La manœuvre secrète d`Aizen
Uragiri! Anyaku no Aizen
Verrat! Aizens heimliche Manöver
裏切り! 暗躍の藍染

REGULAR.description:
Sosuke Aizen suddenly appears in front of Shinji Hirako and the others. He draws his sword on Shinji, who is agonized by his Hollow transformation and cannot move his body at will.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hirako o Sukue! Aizen VS Urahara
Rescue Hirako! Aizen vs. Urahara
Rette Hirako! Aizen vs. Urahara
Sauvetage d`Hirako ! Aizen contre Urahara
平子を救え! 藍染VS浦原

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and his friends leave Karakura Town with the intent of bringing Orihime back, and they continue fighting in Hueco Mundo. Nevertheless, Hollows continue to appear in the World of the Living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Karakurizer Tanjou
Karakurizer: Konsô le justicier. La naissance du héros justicier
Konzo-Bulle Karakurizer ist geboren
The Karakurizer is Born
カラクライザー誕生

REGULAR.description:
Kisuke Urahara has forced Kon to transform into Konso Cop Karakurizer. As Karakurizer, Kon has some powerful allies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Karakuraizer Saigo no Hi
Karakuraizer`s Last Day
Karakurizer: Konsô le justicier. La cape super-utile
Karakurizers letzter Tag
カラクライザー最後の日

REGULAR.description:
Sosuke Aizen brings Kaname Tosen, Gin Ichimaru, and the Espadas Stark, Barragan, and Halibel to the World of the Living on a mission to destroy Karakura Town. The Espadas stand before the Thirteen Court Guard Squads.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Defend Karakura Town! Entire Appearance of the Shinigami
Défendre Karakura ! L`entrée des Shinigamis
Karakurachou o Mamore! Shinigami Soutoujou
Verteidige die Stadt Karakura! Das gesamtes Erscheinungsbild des Shinigami
空座町を護れ! 死神総登場

REGULAR.description:
The Head Captain expected the battle to take place in Karakura Town, so he fights to keep it from being destroyed. He places pillars in four corners of the town to switch the real Karakura Town with a replica that was made in the Soul Society.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Elite! Die vier Shinigami
Elite! The Four Shinigami
L`élite ! Les quatre Shinigamis
Seiei! Yonin no Shinigami
精鋭! 四人の死神

REGULAR.description:
Shuhei, Ikkaku, Yumichika, and Izuru start fighting against the Fracci贸nes that Barragan deployed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beautiful Warrior Charlotte
Charlotte, le beau petit démon !
Schöne kleine Teufelin Charlotte
Utsukushiki Senshi Charlotte
美しき戦士シャルロッテ

REGULAR.description:
Yumichika is trapped inside Chuhlhourne’s briar of darkness. Learning he cannot be seen from the outside world, Yumichika unveils his Zanpakuto’s true power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kira, Zetsubou no Naka de no Tatakai
Kira, der verzweifelte Kampf
Kira, the Battle Within Despair
Le combat désespéré de Kira
吉良, 絶望の中での戦い

REGULAR.description:
Shuhei Hisagi battles Findorr Calius, who has increased his strength level equal to that of a squad lieutenant by shattering his own mask. Shuhei, overwhelmed by the enemy’s power, is forced to stay on the defensive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hisagi Shikai! Sono Na wa...
Hisagi`s Shikai! Der Name ist...
Hisagi`s Shikai! The Name is...
Le Shikai d`Hisagi ! Son nom est...
檜佐木始解! その名は...

REGULAR.description:
Shuhei, Izuru, Yumichika, and Ikkaku fight to guard the four pillars used to switch the real Karakura Town with a fake one.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikkaku Falls! The Shinigami`s Crisis
Ikkaku Taoreru! Shinigami no Kiki
Ikkaku fällt! Die Krise des Shinigami
Ikkaku tombe ! Instant critique pour les Shinigami
一角倒れる! 死神の危機

REGULAR.description:
The Soul Reapers succeed in defending the four pillars from being destroyed, preventing the real Karakura Town from returning to the World of the Living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combat de force ! Shinigami contre Espada
Der große Showdown! Shinigami gegen Espada
The Full Showdown! Shinigami vs. Espada
Zenmen Taiketsu! Shinigami VS Espada
全面対決!死神VS十刃

REGULAR.description:
Soi Fon and Marechiyo Omaeda are to take on Ggio and Nirgge. Soi Fon confidently goes after Ggio, but Ggio puts up a good fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der böseste Tag!? Suì-Feng & Omaeda
La plus puissante des confrontations !? Soi Fon et Ômaeda
Saikyou Tag!? Soi Fon & Oomaeda
The Most Evil Tag!? Soi Fon & Oomaeda
最凶タッグ!? 砕蜂 & 大前田

REGULAR.description:
Ggio, who released his Hollow power, is overpowering Soi Fon. Marechiyo Omaeda realizes that Soi Fon is in a dire situation and comes to help her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Miraculous Body! Ggio Releases
Ein wunderbarer Körper! Ggio-Veröffentlichungen
Kyoui no Nikutai! Ggio Kaihou
Un corps surprenant ! Ggio libéré
驚異の肉体!ジオ解放

REGULAR.description:
Rangiku battles Halibel’s three Fracciónes, Apache, Mila Rose, and Sun-Sun. She attacks with her Haineko, but even that is not very effective against the three opponents.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3 VS 1 no Sentou! Pinch no Rangiku
3 VS 1の戦闘! ピンチの乱菊
3 vs. 1 Battle! Rangiku`s Crisis
Drei-gegen-Einen-Kampf! Rangikus Krise
Trois contre un ! La crise de Rangiku

REGULAR.description:
Apache, Mila Rose, and Sun-Sun release their Resurrección forms. In addition, they combine their left arms to create a mysterious monster called Ayon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All Vice-Captains Annihilated! The Terrifying Demonic Beast
Fuku Taichou Zenmetsu! Kyoufu no Youjuu
Les vice-capitaines annihilés ! Le terrifiant monstre diabolique
Vize-Kommandanten vernichtet! Die schreckliche dämonische Bestie
副隊長全滅! 恐怖の妖獣

REGULAR.description:
The Soul Reapers are defeated one after another at the hands of Ayon. Seeing this, Head Captain Genryusai Yamamoto decides to get involved.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fierce Fighting Concludes? Towards a New Battle!
Gekitou Shuuketsu? Arata Naru Tatakai e!
Ist der heftige Kampf beendet? Auf zu einer neuen Schlacht!
La fin du combat féroce ? Vers une nouvelle bataille !
激闘終結? 新たなる戦いへ!

REGULAR.description:
Mizuiro starts at Karakura First High School without any great expectations or ambitions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein wunderbarer Fehler
Merveilleuse erreur
Wonderful Error
Wonderful Error
ワンダフル・エラー

REGULAR.description:
Rangiku and the members of the Women’s Soul Reaper Association take a relaxing trip to a beach in the World of the Living. All the women are excited about wearing bathing suits that they have picked out for the occasion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu Da! Umi Da! Mizugi Matsuri!!
Sommer! Meer! Badeanzug-Festival!
Summer! Sea! Swimsuit Festival!!
Été et mer ! Le festival des maillots de bain !
夏だ! 海だ! 水着祭!!

REGULAR.description:
Ikkaku and Yumichika are sent after a Hollow that ran away to the World of the Living. They have no prearranged lodging, so they decide to stay at the Asano family house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pleurs de l`âme ? La naissance d`un nouveau Shinigami !
Schrei der Seele? Ein Bettvorleger-Shinigami ist geboren!
The Rug Shinigami is Born!
Zura Shinigami Tanjou!
ヅラ死神誕生!

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious man who calls himself "Muramasa" appears in the Seireitei to declare war against the Soul Reapers. Using his powers, Muramasa gives physical form to the Zanpakuto and liberates them from the captains and lieutenants of the 13 Court Guard Squads.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein neuer Feind! Die Materialisierung des Zanpakuto
The Materialization of Zanpakutou
Un nouvel ennemi ! Le Zanpakutô matérialisé
Zanpakutou Jittaika
斬魄刀実体化

REGULAR.description:
Having sustained severe injuries in battle, Rukia escapes to the World of the Living and is saved by Ichigo. A mysterious woman then arrives through the Senkaimon and proceeds to attack the two using the same Zanpakuto as Rukia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya, Disappearing With the Cherry Blossoms
Byakuya, Sakura to Tomo ni Kiyu
Byakuya, Verschwinden mit den Kirschblüten
Byakuya, disparaissant avec les fleurs de cerisier
白哉, 桜と共に消ゆ

REGULAR.description:
After hearing that Byakuya has gone missing, Rukia returns to the Seireitei to search for her brother and in the process comes across Sodenoshirayuki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sode no Shirayuki contre Rukia ! L`illusion du cœur
Sode no Shirayuki vs Rukia! Kokoro no Madoi
Sode no Shirayuki vs. Rukia! The Delusion of the Heart
Sode no Shirayuki vs. Rukia! Verwirrtes Herz
袖白雪vsルキア! 心の惑い

REGULAR.description:
Muramasa appears before Ichigo and explains how he freed the Zanpakuto from the Soul Reapers, as well as gave them a physical form to exist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Teki to Natta Zangetsu
Zangetsu Becomes an Enemy
Zangetsu devient un ennemi
Zangetsu wird zum Feind
敵となった斬月

REGULAR.description:
The Zanpakuto rebellion has left the Seireitei in a state of destruction with many Soul Reapers still missing, including Squad Six captain Byakuya Kuchiki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ist Renji überrascht?! Die zwei Zabimarus
Renji Kyougaku!? Futari no Zabimaru
Renji Surprised?! The Two Zabimaru
Renji surpris !? Les deux Zabimaru
恋次驚愕!? 2人の蛇尾丸

REGULAR.description:
Inside Ichigo`s mind, Muramasa meets Hollow Ichigo. Taking an interest in him, Muramasa attempts to manifest Hollow Ichigo like he did with Zangetsu, only to discover that his spell does not work on Hollow Ichigo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash ! Hisagi contre Kazeshini
Clash! Hisagi vs. Kazeshini
Gekitotsu! Hisagi vs Kazeshini
Kampf! Hisagi vs. Kazeshini
激突! 檜佐木vs風死

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo has regained his Shikai and battles Muramasa. But Zangetsu, who has sided with Muramasa, steps in to fight Ichigo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bekannmachung! Der neue Getsuga-Tensho
Hanate! Arata Naru Getsuga Tenshou
Libération ! Le nouveau Getsuga Tenshô
Release! The New Getsuga Tenshou
放て! 新たなる月牙天衝

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo`s and Renji`s victories against their own Zanpakuto has proven that a Soul Reaper can reclaim his Zanpakuto by defeating it in battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Feng Sui, umgeben von Zanpakuto
Soi Fon, Surrounding the Zanpakutou
Soi Fon, Zanpakutou o Houi Seyo
Soi Fon, entourant le Zanpakutô
砕蜂, 斬魄刀を包囲せよ

REGULAR.description:
Haineko and Tobiume, two Zanpakuto who do not get along, are walking through the woods when they spot Ichigo, who is in pursuit of Senbonzakura and Byakuya.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amitié ? Haine ? Haineko et Tobiume
Freundschaft? Hass? Haineko und Tobiume
Friendship? Hatred? Haineko & Tobiume
Yuujou? Ken`o? Haineko & Tobiume
友情? 嫌悪? 灰猫 & 飛梅

REGULAR.description:
The battle of Rangiku and Momo versus Haineko and Tobiume heats up, as both sides try to outsmart their opponents. Elsewhere, captain Toshiro Hitsugaya has located his Zanpakuto Hyorinmaru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hyorinmarus Erwachen! Hitsugaya`s erbitterter Kampf
Le réveil de Hyôrinmaru ! Le combat acharné d`Hitsugaya
Mezameyo Hyourinmaru!
The Awakening Hyourinmaru!
目覚めよ氷輪丸!

REGULAR.description:
Results from Mayuri Kurotsuchi`s experiment using Marechiyo Omaeda`s Gegetsuburi show that a manifested Zanpakuto cannot revert to its original sword state when defeated by someone other than its master.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya`s Betrayal
Byakuya`s Verrat
La trahison de Byakuya !
Uragiri no Byakuya
裏切りの白哉

REGULAR.description:
The Thirteen Court Guard Squads, particularly Renji and Rukia, are shocked by the news of Byakuya now supposedly working with Muramasa. Meanwhile, inside Muramasa`s hideout, the Zanpakuto cannot hide their discomfort over having Byakuya join them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For the Sake of Pride! Byakuya vs. Renji
Hokori no Tame ni! Byakuya VS Renji
Pour la fierté ! Byakuya contre Renji
Um des Stolzes Willen! Byakuya vs. Renji
誇りのために! 白哉VS恋次

REGULAR.description:
At the Squad Six Barracks, Renji and Rukia are determined to know why Byakuya has betrayed the Soul Society to work with Muramasa. Their conversation is cut short by the arrival of the manifested Zanpakuto.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinigami & Zanpakutou, Sou Shutsugeki
Shinigami and Zanpakutou, Total Sortie
Shinigami et Zanpakutô, sortie totale
Shinigami und Zanpakuto, Voller Einsatz
死神 & 斬魄刀, 総出撃

REGULAR.description:
The Soul Reapers find themselves in a tough battle against the manifested Zanpakuto, including Ichigo who is struggling against Senbonzakura.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel ! Ichigo contre Senbonzakura !
Ikkiuchi! Ichigo VS Senbonzakura
Mann gegen Mann! Ichigo vs. Senbonzakura
One-to-One Fight! Ichigo vs. Senbonzakura
一騎打ち! 一護VS千本桜

REGULAR.description:
The battle between Soul Reapers and Zanpakuto heats up as Kenpachi joins in the fight. Kenpachi easily overwhelms the Zanpakuto with his incredible Spirit Energy and then goes off to challenge Byakuya.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der lang Erwartete... Kenpachi erscheint!
L`homme tant attendu... Kenpachi apparaît !
Man o Jishite... Kenpachi Toujou!
The Long Awaited... Kenpachi Appears!
満を持して... 剣八登場!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo, Renji, Rukia, and Izuru collapse after being exposed to Konjiki Ashisogijizo`s poison. Konjiki Ashisogijizo then seeks for its next prey but is stopped by Yachiru Kusajishi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya o Oe! Konran no Gotei Tai
Il faut poursuivre Byakuya ! Confusion dans le Gotei 13
Pursue Byakuya! The Confused Gotei Divisions
Verfolgt Byakuya! Die verwirrten Gotei-Divisionen
白哉を追え! 混乱の護廷隊

REGULAR.description:
Yoruichi has located Muramasa`s hideout where Head Captain Yamamoto is being held. A team comprised of Ichigo, Shunsui, Jushiro, Kenpachi, and Yoruichi sets out to rescue the Head Captain, but the group soon encounters the Zanpakuto who were anticipating their arrival.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mission spéciale ! À la rescousse du capitaine-commandant Yamamoto !
Sondereinsatz! Rettet General Kommandant Yamamoto!
Special Mission! Rescue Captain-Commander Yamamoto!
Tokumu! Yamamoto Sou Taichou o Kyuushutsu Seyo!
特務! 山本総隊長を救出せよ!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo battles Muramasa in order to save Head Captain Yamamoto from captivity. Meanwhile, Yoruichi, Shunsui, and Jushiro notice that the Zanpakuto are trying to prevent them from reaching Ichigo, and quickly realize that he was the key to Muramasa`s plan all along.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Betrogener Shinigami! Die Weltkollaps-Krise
Damasareta Shinigami! Sekai Houkai no Kiki
Deceived Shinigami! The World Collapse Crisis
Les Shinigamis dupés ! La crise d`un monde qui s`effondre
騙された死神! 世界崩壊の危機

REGULAR.description:
Muramasa`s true objective is revealed to be in Karakura Town. Ichigo and the other Soul Reapers try to go after Muramasa, but the manifested Zanpakuto of Genryusai`s Ryujinjakka stands in their way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Drache des Eises und Drache der Flamme! Der stärkste Showdown!
Dragon de glace et dragon de feu ! La confrontation des plus puissants !
Dragon of Ice and Dragon of Flame! The Strongest Showdown!
Koori no Ryuu to Honoo no Ryuu! Saikyou Taiketsu!
氷の龍と炎の龍! 最強対決!

REGULAR.description:
Uryu, Chad, and Orihime confront Muramasa who has entered the World of the Living. Using teamwork, Uryu and Chad at first appear to gain the upper hand in battle, when Senbonzakura appears to assist Muramasa.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Bankai de Senbonzakura ! La bataille du monde des vivants
Senbonzakura Bankai! Gensei no Koubou
Senbonzakura`s Bankai! Offense and Defense of the Living World
Senbonzakuras Bankai! Angriff und Verteidigung der lebenden Welt
千本桜卍解! 現世の攻防

REGULAR.description:
Centuries ago, Ginrei Kuchiki, Byakuya Kuchiki`s grandfather, and his son-in-law Koga Kuchiki were assigned to bring down the rebel forces threatening the Seireitei. With his Zanpakuto Muramasa`s power, Koga wipes out the renegade Soul Reapers one after another, and soon his strength becomes known throughout the Soul Society. Yet Koga himself was frustrated by the fact that his father-in-law Ginrei did not seem to acknowledge his accomplishments.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cet homme, pour le bien des Kuchiki
Der Mann, um der Kuchiki willen
Sono Otoko, Kuchiki-Ke Yue ni
That Man, For the Sake of the Kuchiki
その男・朽木家ゆえに

REGULAR.description:
Koga Kuchiki escapes his confinement and in the process, kills the Soul Reapers who framed him. Although Ginrei sympathizes with his son-in-law`s situation, he reprimands Koga for his rash actions. Enraged, Koga severs his ties with the Kuchiki clan and begins killing Soul Reapers and innocent people.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dark History! The Worst Shinigami is Born
Dunkle Geschichte! Der schlimmste Shinigami ist geboren
Histoire obscure ! Le plus mauvais Shinigami nait
Yami no Rekishi! Saikyou no Shinigami, Tanjou
闇の歴史! 最凶の死神, 誕生

REGULAR.description:
To uphold the honor of his family, Byakuya Kuchiki fights the resurrected Koga Kuchiki. Meanwhile, the despair of being abandoned by Koga takes its toll on Muramasa`s body.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya, Uragiri ni Kakusareta Shinjitsu
Byakuya, die Wahrheit hinter seinem Verrat
Byakuya, la vérité sur sa trahison
Byakuya, the Truth Behind his Betrayal
白哉, 裏切りに隠された真実

REGULAR.description:
Koga`s betrayal causes Muramasa to lose control over all of the Hollows he absorbed to sustain himself. To make matters worse, his immense Spiritual Pressure begins to attract other Hollows to Karakura Town. As Ichigo, Uryu, Chad, Orihime, and Rukia work together to deal with the situation, Muramasa fires a massive Cero towards them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akasareta Muramasa no Shoutai
La vraie identité de Muramasa est révélée
Muramasa`s True Identity Revealed
Muramasas wahre Identität enthüllt
明かされた村正の正体

REGULAR.description:
Uryu and the others attempt to save Ichigo, who has been engulfed by Muramasa, but with little success. Meanwhile, the Soul Reapers of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads team up with their own Zanpakuto to fight the Hollows that have appeared in the World of the Living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya and Renji, the 6th Division Returns
Byakuya et Renji, de retour dans la sixième division
Byakuya to Renji, Roku Ban Tai Futatabi
Byakuya und Renji, die Rückkehr der 6. Einheit
白哉と恋次, 六番隊再び

REGULAR.description:
Inside Muramasa`s mind, Ichigo clashes blades with Muramasa. As Muramasa`s body and mind reach their limits, he begins to transform into a Hollow. With little time remaining, Ichigo and Muramasa decide to settle their score once and for all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chapitre final : Les histoires inconnues des Zanpakutô
Final Chapter Zanpakuto Unknown Tales
Letztes Kapitel – Zanpakuto. Die alternative Geschichte
Owari, Zanpakutou Ibun Hen
終章・斬魄刀異聞篇

REGULAR.description:
With the defeat of Muramasa, peace has returned to the Soul Society. Renji, Rukia, and the other Soul Reapers are having a good time at the Kuchiki mansion`s party, when the place is suddenly attacked by two unknown beings. Having left her Zanpakuto behind, Rukia falls into danger when, to her surprise, the manifested Sodenoshirayuki comes to her rescue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya`s Anger! The Kuchiki Family Collapses
Der wütende Byakuya! Der Zusammenbruch des Hauses Kuchiki
Ikari no Byakuya! Kuchikike Houkai
La colère de Byakuya ! La chute de la famille Kuchiki
怒りの白哉! 朽木家崩壊

REGULAR.description:
The assailants who attacked the Kuchiki mansion are identified as "Sword Beasts," manifested Zanpakuto of Soul Reapers who lost their lives during the battle with Muramasa. Due to the potential danger, an order is issued throughout the Soul Society to hunt down all remaining Sword Beasts, including ones who have escaped into the World of the Living. Toshiro, Hyorinmaru, Rangiku, and Haineko go after a Sword Beast who is in the World of the Living searching for its master.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Enemy! The True Nature of the Beast Swords
Arata na Teki! Toujuu no Shoutai
Ein neuer Feind! Die wahre Natur der Schwertbestien
Un nouvel ennemi ! La vraie nature des épées bestiales
新たな敵! 刀獣の正体

REGULAR.description:
Renji and Zabimaru (Monkey and Snake) come to the World of the Living to go after a Sword Beast. However, Snake is too distracted by his surroundings, and as a result lets the Sword Beast escape. After being scolded by Renji and Monkey, a frustrated Snake decides he wants to be his own man and runs off.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maigo no Hebi, Junan no Saru
Serpent errant, singe torturé
Stray Snake, Tortured Monkey
Streunende Schlange, gequälter Affe
迷子の蛇, 受難の猿

REGULAR.description:
Isane and Hanataro are troubled by the recent reports of someone stealing food from the Squad Four barracks. Evidence shows that the thief is hiding in an underground waterway, and so a team comprised of Hanataro, Nanao, Ikkaku, and Hozukimaru is sent down for investigation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoufu! Chika ni Hisomu Kaibutsu
Terreur ! Le monstre qui se cache sous terre
Terror! Das Monster, das unter der Erde lauert
Terror! The Monster That Lurks Underground
恐怖! 地下に潜む怪物

REGULAR.description:
Following Muramasa`s defeat, most of the Zanpakuto have reconciled and returned to their masters, except for Kazeshini, who is still out to kill his former master Shuhei Hisagi. When Kazeshini goes into the Rukon District in the hopes of finding Shuhei, he instead comes across an infant who just lost his father to a Sword Beast. To Kazeshini`s annoyance, the infant has taken a liking to the rogue Zanpakuto and now refuses to leave his side.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Abschluss!? Hisagi vs. Kazeshini
Conclusion !? Hisagi contre Kazeshini !
Conclusion?! Hisagi vs. Kazeshini
Kecchaku!? Hisagi VS Kazeshini
決着!? 檜佐木VS風死

REGULAR.description:
Karakura Town has been experiencing a string of assaults, and the victims have all been reported to be high school girls carrying a pink bear charm. Meanwhile, a new girl transfers into Orihime`s class and introduces herself as Kyoko Haida. When Orihime accidentally exposes her powers before Kyoko, the new girl takes an interest in her, claiming she is worthy to become her friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Person mit der unbekannten Fähigkeit! Orihime ist im Visier
La personne aux capacités inconnues ! Orihime est prise pour cible
Michi naru Nouryokusha! Nerawareta Orihime
The Person with the Unknown Ability! Orihime is Targeted
未知なる能力者! 狙われた織姫

REGULAR.description:
During a mission to hunt down the Sword Beasts, Haineko comes across a wounded Sword Beast called Narunosuke and, to her surprise, falls in love with the handsome enemy before her. Believing that Narunosuke is different from other Sword Beasts, Haineko goes against her orders and decides to look after him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haineko crie ! Les tragiques épées bestiales
Haineko weint! Die tragische Schwertbestie!
Higeki no Toujuu! Haineko, Goukyuu!
The Tragic Sword Fiend! Haineko Cries!
悲劇の刀獣! 灰猫, 号泣!

REGULAR.description:
Renji`s Zanpakuto Zabimaru, consisting of Monkey and Snake, are irritated over the fact that Byakuya`s Senbonzakura is taking all the credit for their work. Later, a small accident leads to the three Zanpakuto becoming trapped inside the Department of Research and Development`s facility. As they try to find a means to escape, the two Zabimarus find Senbonzakura to be more troublesome than either of them had anticipated.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Confinement!? Senbonzakura and Zabimaru
Emprisonnement ?! Senbonzakura et Zabimaru
Haft?! Senbonzakura und Zabimaru
Yuuhei!? Senbonzakura & Zabimaru
幽閉!? 千本桜&蛇尾丸

REGULAR.description:
Lieutenant Nanao Ise is paired up with Katenkyokotsu Wakizashi, the shorter of Captain Kyoraku`s two swords, to hunt for Sword Beasts. But Nanao finds Wakizashi`s malicious and distrustful nature to be quite difficult to work with.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bataille de femmes ? Nanao contre Katen Kyôkotsu !
Kampf der Frauen? Katen Kyokotsu gegen Nanao!
Onna no Tatakai? Katenkyoukotsu VS Nanao!
Women`s Fight? Katenkyoukotsu vs Nanao!
女の戦い? 花天狂骨VS七緒!

REGULAR.description:
The Zanpakuto notice the remaining Sword Beasts acting strangely and realize it to be the work of Kirikaze, a Sword Beast capable of robbing Spirit Energy from others. With their time to manifest as physical entities reaching its limits, the Zanpakuto are determined to carry out their last mission to defeat Kirikaze.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Evolution?! Die Bedrohung durch die letzte Schwertbestie
Progress!? The Last Sword Fiend Threat!
Shinka!? Saigo no Toujuu no Kyoui!
Évolution ?! La merveille du final des épées bestiales
進化!? 最後の刀獣の脅威!

REGULAR.description:
Aizen leads Tosen, Gin, and the Espadas as they invade the World of the Living. Aizen’s real objective is to annihilate Karakura Town to create Ouken, the royal key and take the Soul Society by storm. The Soul Reapers anticipate this and prepare for battle. Meanwhile, Ichigo gets on his way to save Orihime from the Fifth Tower where she is being held captive. And then, Ichigo and Ulquiorra’s fated showdown finally begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo VS Ulquiorra, Saikai!
Ichigo Vs Ulquiorra, Restart!
Ichigo contre Ulquiorra, réouverture
Ichigo vs. Ulquiorra, Resümee
一護VSウルキオラ, 再開!

REGULAR.description:
Below the Fifth Tower, Sado and Renji battle it out with a giant Hollow. But then, the sandman Batticaloa arrives to the scene. Batticaloa’s body is made of sand, so Sado and Renji have a hard time inflicting any damage on him. And Rukia, whose ice-snow Zanpakuto is the sole weapon that can contend with Batticaloa, is struggling in another battle against Rudobon. Meanwhile, Ichigo and Ulquiorra are still battling when Ichigo learns that Orihime has already been converted to Ulquiorra’s side. Ichigo pretends it doesn’t concern him, but he can’t hide his distress.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Connected Hearts! The Left Fist Prepared for Death!
Les cœurs connectés. Le poing gauche préparé à la mort
Tsunagaru Kokoro! Kesshi no Hidari Koushi!
Verbundene Herzen! Die linke Faust des sicheren Todes
繋がる心! 決死の左拳!

REGULAR.description:
While Orihime is watching Ichigo and Ulquiorra’s battle from the sidelines, Loly and Menoly appear before her. They learned that Orihime is no longer of any use to Aizen, and they want to seize this opportunity to defeat her. Orihime has no means to fight back, and she gets hurt left and right. When Ichigo notices this, he tries to go rescue her, but Ulquiorra keeps getting in his way, and he is unable to get anywhere near Orihime. Amidst the chaos, a new enemy breaks through the floor of the Fifth Tower and appears before Ichigo and the others. The new enemy is none other than Yammy who came to assist Ulquiorra.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haine et jalousie, le dilemme d`Orihime
Hass und Eifersucht, Orihimes Dilemma
Jealousy and Hatred... Orihime`s Dilemma
Shitto to Zouo... Kyuuchi no Orihime!
嫉妬と憎悪... 窮地の織姫!

REGULAR.description:
Uryu rushes to stop Yammy from attacking Orihime. Ichigo is surprised, but Uryu charges at Yammy without hesitation. Uryu notices that Ichigo, concerned about Orihime, was not using the power of his Hollowfication, and Uryu was trying to get the fight with Yammy over with as quickly as possible. However, Yammy’s body is tough, and every attack from Ginreikojaku’s arrow and Seeleschneider is repelled. Yammy triumphantly brings out a giant Cero on them. Just when they thought it couldn’t get any worse…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo and Uryuu, Back to Back Bonds!
Ichigo et Uryû, liés dos à dos
Ichigo to Uryuu, Senaka Awase no Kizuna!
Ichigo und Uryu, Rücken an Rücken
一護と雨竜(うりゅう), 背中合わせの絆!

REGULAR.description:
Ulquiorra’s sword release, Murcielago, is too strong for Ichigo and every swift attack further injures him. Even when he fires Getsugatensho with all of his remaining power, Ichigo is unable to wound Ulquiorra. In spite of that, Ichigo continues to attack Ulquiorra in order to save Orihime and go back with his friends. But Ulquiorra tries to show off his Resurreccion Segunda Etapa.  Meanwhile, Orihime and Uryu are worried about Ichigo as they head to the top of the dome…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beginn der Verzweiflung... Ichigo, die unerreichbare Klinge
Beginning of Despair... Ichigo, the Unreachable Blade
Les prémices du désespoir... Ichigo, la lame inaccessible
Zetsubou no Hajimari... Ichigo, Todokanu Yaiba
絶望の始まり... 一護, 届かぬ刃

REGULAR.description:
When Orihime and Uryu make it to the top of the dome, they see Ichigo collapsed in front of Ulquiorra. Orihime’s reaction is to rush over to Ichigo, but Ulquiorra tells her that it’s no use. Just then, Uryu hits Ulquiorra with his arrow. But like all of Ichigo’s attacks, Uryu’s arrow is ineffective against Ulquiorra. Ulquiorra attacks back and Uryu is no longer able to even draw his bow. Distressed by the situation, Orihime calls out to the immobile Ichigo for help. Then something happens to Ichigo’s body….
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo Dies! Orihime, the Cry of Sorrow!
Ichigo Shisu! Orihime, Hitsuu no Sakebi!
Ichigo meurt. Orihime, les pleurs de tristesse
一護死す! 織姫, 悲痛の叫び!

REGULAR.description:
Rukia, Renji, and Sado are battling Rudobon and the soldiers he created. But then, another enemy appears before them. It is Yammy, who fell off of the Fifth Tower. The three of them are surprised that Yammy has transformed into a giant. In the meantime, on top of the dome, a Hollowfied Ichigo is fighting Ulquiorra. When Uryu tries to stop Ichigo…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo Vs Ulquiorra, Conclusion!
Ichigo contre Ulquiorra, conclusion
Ichigo vs Ulquiorra, Kecchaku!
一護vsウルキオラ, 決着!

REGULAR.description:
Rukia, Renji, and Sado struggle against the giant Yammy. However, when they see Yammy’s tattoo of the number “10”, they realize that he is weaker than the Espadas they’ve fought in the past. Each one of them tries to go after Yammy, but Yammy releases  his sword, Ira , which overwhelms them. Meanwhile, in Karakura Town, the battle between the Soul Reapers and the Espada, led by Aizen, intensifies. Halibel attacks Hitsugaya, who achieves Bankai and counterattacks, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fury of a Shark! Halibel Releases
La furie du requin, Hallibel se libère
Same no Moui! Halibel Kaihou
鮫の猛威! ハリベル解放

REGULAR.description:
Hitsugaya is doing everything he can to counter Halibel’s sword release, Tiburon. Halibel says she will win against Hitsugaya to avenge her Fracciónes. She melts the ice with Hirviendo and drives Hitsugaya into a corner. Hitsugaya counters by turning Halibel’s water attack into ice with his Zanpakuto, Hyorinmaru, but Halibel has other tricks up her sleeve…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitsugaya, Sutemi no Hyoutenhyakkasou!
Hitsugaya, les funérailles des 1000 fleurs du paradis de glace
Hitsugaya, the Suicidal Frozen Heavens Hundred Flowers Funeral!
日番谷, 捨て身の氷天百華葬[ひょうてんひゃっかそう]!

REGULAR.description:
While Hitsugaya and Halibel’s battle looks to be coming to a close, Omaeda and Soi Fon fight against Barragan. Just when Soi Fon is about to attack Barragan, Soi Fon suddenly becomes sluggish. Soi Fon is baffled, and Barragan tells her that he has the power to age people. Barragan only has to will old age upon his opponent and touch that person for the opponent to immediately grow old and die. Soi Fon now understands the severity of this power, but she has already been touched by Barragan…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le souffle de la mort approche, le roi qui règne sur la mort
Semaru Shi no Ibuki... Shi o Tsukasadoru Ou!
The Approaching Breath of Death... the King Who Rules Over Death!
迫る死の息吹... 死を司る王!

REGULAR.description:
The battle between the Soul Reapers and the Espada becomes more and more tense. Soi Fon and Omaeda find themselves in a bad situation against Barragan’s Respira. They can’t even counterattack Respira because they can’t get anywhere near it. Then, Soi Fon goes off somewhere, leaving Omaeda to fight Barragan alone. Omaeda attacks with Gegetsuburi, but Barragan destroys it easily with Respira. Just when Omaeda is backed into a corner, Soi Fon arrives, having released her Bankai…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigeki Kessatsu! Soi Fon, Bankai!
La mort en un coup, le Bankai de Soi Fon
One Hit Kill! Soi Fon, Bankai!
一撃決殺! 砕蜂, 卍解!

REGULAR.description:
Kyoraku and Stark are both fighting defensively in their battle. But Stark’s expression changes when he spots Hitsugaya and Soi Fon’s Bankai. Kyoraku leaves his haori with Ukitake to confront Stark. Stark calls Lilinette over, and tells everyone that the two of them used to be one person. Stark then releases his Resurrección and takes on the form of Los Lobos. Kyoraku achieves Shikai and they continue to fight for real!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Climax! Kyouraku Vs Starrk!
Hakunetsu! Kyouraku vs Starrk!
Paroxysme. Kyoraku contre Starrk
白熱! 京楽vsスターク!

REGULAR.description:
Kyoraku is in a pinch, and Ukitake, who had been watching the battle, steps in. Ukitake fires Cero at Stark, even though it is a technique that Soul Reapers shouldn’t be able to use. Stark is surprised, but he quickly recovers from the shock and shoots something back at him. Then, all of a sudden, Garganta starts to open to reveal the creepy Wonderweiss and Fura. All of the Soul Reapers are exhausted from battling, and they are in no state to face a new opponent…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akumu Futatabi... Fukkatsu no Espada
Le cauchemar revient... La résurrection de l`Espada
The Nightmare Returns... Revival of the Espada
悪夢再び... 復活の十刃

REGULAR.description:
The Soul Reapers find themselves in hot water against Fura and Wonderweiss when the Visoreds, led by Shinji Hirako, make their appearance. Used in Aizen’s Hollowfication experiment 101 years ago, the Visoreds have since lived in hiding in the World of the Living. Believing that now is the time to defeat Aizen, the Visoreds have set foot on the battlefield.  Recognizing familiar faces, both Visoreds and Soul Reapers exchange words with one another. Wonderweiss disrupts the scene by signaling Fura to release hordes of Menos…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hirako and Aizen... the Reunion of Fate!
Hirako et Aizen... La réunion du destin
Hirako to Aizen... Innen no Saikai!
平子と藍染... 因縁の再会!

REGULAR.description:
Hisagi joins Komamura to battle Tosen in hopes of bringing his former captain back to his senses. Meanwhile the other Soul Reapers form an uneasy alliance with the Visoreds: Lisa, Hiyori, and Hitsugaya take on Halibel. Love and Rose take on Stark. Hachi, Omaeda, and Soi Fon take on Barragan. The battle against the Espada resumes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hisagi and Tousen, the Moment of Parting
Hisagi et Tosen, le moment de la séparation
Hisagi to Tousen... Ketsubetsu no Toki!
檜佐木と東仙... 訣別の時!

REGULAR.description:
Barragan appears to be defeated by the combined efforts of Hachigen and Soi Fon. But the two are shocked to find Barragan forcing open Hachigen’s Shiju Saimon barrier. As king of Hueco Mundo, Barragan is determined to show the world his absolute strength and power. His reason originates as far back to when he once reigned over his subjects in Las Noches. Having no enemies to conquer, Barragan would pit his subjects against one another to fight off his boredom. That was when Aizen arrived in Hueco Mundo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Couronne des mensonges, la rancœur de Barragan
Crown of Lies, Baragan`s Grudge
Itsuwari no Oukan, Baragan no Enkon
偽りの王冠, バラガンの怨恨

REGULAR.description:
Stark shows no sign of getting serious in his battle against Love and Rose. Running out of patience, Lilinette begins to mindlessly fire at the two Visoreds without Stark’s permission. But her attacks prove to be ineffective against the two, and she is gradually cornered by the pair’s fine team play. Finally, Love hits Stark with his Zanpakuto attack, and the Espada is thrown into a sea of flames.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le pouvoir de l`âme. L`attaque des loups
Power of the Soul! The Wolves, Attack!
Tamashii no Chikara! Los Lobos, Shuurai!
魂の力! 群狼, 襲来!

REGULAR.description:
Stark splits his own soul and shapes it into packs of wolves and launches them against Love and Rose. Preparing to deliver the finishing blow, Stark is caught off guard by Shunsui, who suddenly appears out of Stark’s shadow. Despite his best efforts to dodge the attacks, Stark is gradually weakened. Just then the wolves, headed by Lilinette, swarm over Shunsui. He brushes them off, and the wolves disappear. Stark calls out for Lilinette but hears no reply.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Stark, le combat solitaire
Starrk, Tatta Hitori no Tatakai
Starrk, the Lone Battle
スターク, たった独りの戦い

REGULAR.description:
Las Noches. Long ago, Apache, at the time still an Adjucha-class Hollow, was hunted by other Hollows when Halibel saved her life. Apache soon joins Halibel’s group consisting of Sun-Sun and Mila Rose. As they spend more time together, Apache notices Halibel does not devour the enemies she defeats. When questioned, Halibel responds that she does not wish to become stronger by sacrificing others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chain of Sacrifice, Harribel`s Past
Chaîne de sacrifice, le passé de Hallibel
Gisei no Rensa, Harribel no Kako
犠牲の連鎖, ハリベルの過去

REGULAR.description:
With the Espada gone, the Visoreds are now able to confront Aizen. Having been unwilling test subjects in Aizen’s past experiment, the Visoreds make no effort to hide their hatred toward the man who destroyed their lives. Hiyori, unable hold in her anger, is the first to attack Aizen with her blade. Meanwhile, Chad, Renji, and Rukia continue their fight against Yammy in Hueco Mundo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cent ans de rancune. La vengeance de Hiyori
Hyakunen no Enkon! Hiyori no Fukushuu
The Hundred-Year Grudge! Hiyori`s Revenge
百年の怨恨! ひよ里の復讐

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo goes up against Yammy. Rukia notices that Ichigo is acting strange following his battle with Ulquiorra and shows her concern for him. Ichigo is also shaken up by the fact that his Hollowfication now feels different. But, unable to forgive Yammy for labeling Ulquiorra and Grimmjow as trash, Ichigo makes another attempt at his Hollowfication.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo no Kikan! Karakurachou o Mamore
Ichigo`s Return! Protect Karakura Town
Protéger Karakura. Ichigo, vers le monde réel
一護の帰還! 空座町を護れ

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo wakes up to find himself in the middle of a desert. Sitting next to a confused Ichigo are Uryu, Orihime, and Chad, all dressed in an Arabian style. Introducing themselves as “Urio,” “Ori Mei,” and “Chaido,” the three explain that they are in search of a treasure called the “Snow Crystal.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chronique. Ichigo et la lampe magique
Gaiden! Ichigo to Mahou no Lamp
Side Story! Ichigo and the Magic Lamp
外伝! 一護と魔法のランプ

REGULAR.description:
Kenpachi overcomes Yammy’s monstrous size and tough exterior to land a clean blow against the Espada. Meanwhile, Ichigo uses Garganta to return to the World of the Living. On the way, Captain Unohana explains to Ichigo about Aizen’s power of “Complete Hypnosis.” She then reveals that Ichigo is the key to defeating Aizen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`atout final. Ichigo, vers la bataille décisive
Saigo no Kirifuda! Ichigo, Kessen e
The Final Trump Card! Ichigo, Towards the Decisive Battle
最後の切り札! 一護, 決戦へ

REGULAR.description:
As he holds a dying Hiyori, an enraged Hirako readies himself to confront Aizen in battle. Meanwhile, Hisagi and Komamura battle Tosen in a desperate attempt to bring their former ally back to his senses. But Tosen, who believes he follows a just path, ignores their plea and attacks them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya VS Kenpachi?! Ransen Kaishi
Byakuya contre Kenpachi. La mêlée commence
Byakuya vs. Kenpachi?! The Melee Commences
白哉VS剣八?! 乱戦開始

REGULAR.description:
Komamura performs his Bankai, Kokujo Tengen Myo-oh, to subdue Tosen. However, Tosen has already deduced the weakness of Komamura’s Bankai from years of working closely together. Despite the damage received, Komamura refuses to give up on his former friend, throwing out the question of why Tosen chose to become a Soul Reaper in the first place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For the Sake of Justice?! The Man Who Deserted the Shinigami
Pour l`amour de la justice. L`homme qui a déserté les Shinigami
Seigi no Tame ni?! Shinigami o Suteta Otoko
正義の為に?! 死神を捨てた男

REGULAR.description:
Tosen is now able to see in his Ressureccion form. But Komamura states that in exchange for his vision, Tosen has now blinded his own heart. Unable to bring himself to kill the man he wanted to save, Komamura falls before Tosen’s attack. Meanwhile, Hirako prepares to use his Shikai, Sakanade, against Aizen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aizen to no Shitou! Hirako, Shikai!
Desperate Struggle with Aizen! Hirako, Shikai!
Lutte désesperée contre Aizen. Le Shikai d`Hirako
藍染との死闘! 平子, 始解!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo has returned to the World of the Living to battle Aizen. After an unsuccessful first attack, Ichigo Hollowfies to deliver his Getsugatensho against Aizen, but that too proves ineffective. Witnessing the immense power Aizen holds, Ichigo begins to lose his will to fight, when the Thirteen Court Guard Squads stand up to support him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All Out War! Aizen vs. Shinigami!
Guerre totale. Aizen contre Shinigami
Zenmen Sensou! Aizen VS Shinigami!
全面戦争! 藍染VS死神!

REGULAR.description:
The Thirteen Court Guard Squads and Visoreds launch a full-scale attack against Aizen. But Aizen makes quick work of their combined efforts. Just when all hope is thought to be lost, Hirako uses his Zanpakuto’s power to draw away Aizen’s attention, giving way for Hitsugaya to deliver the killing blow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitsugaya, Enraged! Blade of Hatred!
Hitsugaya, Gekkou! Nikushimi no Yaiba!
Lame de la haine. La colère d`Hitsugaya
日番谷, 激昂! 憎しみの刃!

REGULAR.description:
