Head Captain Genryusai Yamamoto of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads steps in to battle Aizen. Genryusai’s attempt to incinerate Aizen in a blazing inferno is thwarted by Wonderweiss, whose Ressureccion form extinguishes the flames. Wonderweiss is revealed to be a Mod Arrancar created by Aizen for the sole purpose of sealing away Genryusai’s zanpakuto, Ryujinjakka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuuinsareta Genryuusai!
Impossible d`attaquer. Genryûsai scellé
The Sealed Genryuusai!
封印された元柳斎!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo succeeds in wounding Aizen with his Hollowfied Getsugatensho attack. But to his surprise, the Hogyoku instantly heals Aizen’s wound. Aizen then reveals an even more shocking truth to Ichigo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s All a Trap... Engineered Bonds!
Subete wa Wana... Shikumareta Kizuna!
Tout n`est qu`un piège... Liens réalisés
全ては罠... 仕組まれた絆!

REGULAR.description:
Aizen’s revelation that Ichigo is his greatest research subject throws Ichigo into a state of shock. But before Aizen can reveal Ichigo’s most startling secret he is interrupted by an unexpected person arriving on the scene.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La choquante vérité... Le mystérieux pouvoir intérieur d`Ichigo
Shougeki no Shinjitsu... Ichigo ni Himerareta Chikara!
The Shocking Truth...The Mysterious Power Within Ichigo!
衝撃の真実... 一護に秘められた力!

REGULAR.description:
As they cross blades, Gin asks Ichigo if he recalls their last encounter, to which Ichigo responds he does not remember Gin’s “heart” being present back then. Ichigo’s answer prompts Gin to display his Bankai and its incredible power. Meanwhile, Isshin notices a change occurring within Aizen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Extension de la lame. Ichigo contre Gin
Nobiru Yaiba!? Ichigo VS Gin!
The Extending Blade?! Ichigo vs. Gin!
伸びる刃!? 一護VSギン!

REGULAR.description:
A Seireitei International Film Festival is to be held in the Soul Society, and Nanao recruits Ichigo and his friends to cooperate with the filming. The crew consists of Rukia in the lead role, Renji as the director, Uryu as the costume designer, with Rangiku, Orihime, and Chad as supporting cast members. Will these guys really be able complete the film and win the award for best film?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eiga Da! Matsuri Da! Shinigami Eigasai!
Film! Festival! Shinigami Film Festival!
Le film des Shinigamis
映画だ! 祭りだ! 死神映画祭!

REGULAR.description:
While visiting the World of the Living, Rukia comes across Kurumadani, the current Soul Reaper stationed in Karakura Town, being attacked by a mysterious masked man. To her surprise, the masked man reveals himself as Shrieker, the Hollow previously defeated and sent to hell by Rukia and Chad.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cérémonie d`ouverture. Chapitre des enfers : Prologue
Gekijou Koukai Kinen! Jigoku Hen: Joshou
Theatre Opening Commemoration! Hell Chapter: Prologue
劇場公開記念! 地獄編・序章

REGULAR.description:
Kisuke Urahara steps onto the battlefield as Aizen, fused with the Hogyoku, begins his transformation. Urahara’s Kido attack appears ineffective against Aizen, who claims he has complete control over the Hogyoku. But Urahara’s true goal was to turn Aizen’s own spirit energy against himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Urahara Appears! Stop Aizen!
Urahara Toujou! Aizen o Soshi Seyo!
Urahara apparaît. Stopper Aizen
浦原登場! 藍染を阻止せよ!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo finds himself cornered against Gin’s Bankai. But to Ichigo’s surprise, Gin advises him to run from this battle. Meanwhile, Urahara, Yoruichi, and Isshin fight Aizen in a three-on-one battle. But none of their attacks appear to work against Aizen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo Loses His Fighting Spirit!? Gin`s Expectation!
Ichigo perd son esprit combatif. La prédiction de Gin
Ichigon Sen`isoushitsu!? Gin no Omowaku!
一護, 戦意喪失!? ギンの思惑!

REGULAR.description:
While going after Aizen, who has left for Karakura Town, Ichigo and Isshin arrive in the Precipice World, a place where time flows two thousand times slower than the outside world. Isshin decides to use this opportunity to have Ichigo acquire the “Final Getsugatensho,” which could defeat Aizen. Meanwhile, at the Karakura Town relocated to the Soul Society, Keigo and Tatsuki wake up to realize something terrible is happening to their town.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ultime Getsuga Tenshô. L`entraînement d`Ichigo
Saigo no Getsuga Tenshou!? Ichigo no Shugyou!
The Final Getsuga Tenshou!? Ichigo`s Training!
最後の月牙天衝!? 一護の修行!

REGULAR.description:
The Women’s Soul Reaper Association is hosting a New Year’s party in the Soul Society, when Hitsugaya and the other male Soul Reapers come crashing in. Meanwhile in the World of the Living, everyone is spending New Year’s with their families. Orihime, who has no family, spends her time alone, when Rukia and Renji come by to say their New Year’s greeting.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gensei mo Shinigami mo! Oshougatsu Special!
Le monde réel et les Shinigamis. Épisode spécial nouvel an
Real World and Shinigami! The New Year Special!
現世も死神も! お正月スペシャル!

REGULAR.description:
Two monster hunters arrive at an old castle where Franken Ichigo, Succubus Rukia, Vampire Uryu, Pumpkin Orihime, Mummy Renji, Witch Rangiku, and Wolfman Hitsugaya all live as lackluster monsters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Another Side Story! This Time the Enemy Is a Monster!?
Gaiden Futatabi! Kondo no Teki wa Monster!?
Une autre chronique. Cette fois l`ennemi est un vrai monstre
外伝再び! 今度の敵はモンスター!?

REGULAR.description:
Shuhei Hisagi leads a busy life handling the duties of Squad 9 Lieutenant and Editor in Chief of the Seireitei Bulletin, as well as preparing picnic lunches for the Soul Reapers. One day, Hisagi and Rangiku are sent to investigate a string of disappearances in the Rukon district. But being alone together with Rangiku causes Hisagi’s imagination to go wild, which worsens when Rangiku suggests spending the night at an inn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bousou Bakusou! Hisagi, Onsen Ryokan e!
Cris illusoires. Hisagi à l`auberge des sources chaudes
Delusion Roars! Hisagi, Towards the Hot Springs Inn!
妄想爆走! 檜佐木(ひさぎ), 温泉旅館へ!

REGULAR.description:
Aizen and Gin close in on Tatsuki, when Don Kanonji comes to the rescue. A still-injured Rangiku also arrives to confront Gin. Meanwhile, seeking to learn the Final Getsugatensho, Ichigo battles Tensa Zangetsu and Hollow Ichigo, who have now merged into one being.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For the Sake of Protecting! Ichigo Vs. Tensa Zangetsu!
Mamoru Tame ni! Ichigo vs Tensa Zangetsu!
Protéger Ichigo contre Tensa Zangetsu
護(まも)るために! 一護vs天鎖斬月!

REGULAR.description:
Aizen continues his pursuit of Ichigo’s friends. Fearing for their lives, Keigo attempts to attack Aizen using the Zanpakuto he stole from Kurumadani. Gin returns to Aizen after having personally dealt with Rangiku, and his appearance prompts Tatsuki and the others to prepare for the worst.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Emergency Situation! Aizen, New Evolution!
Kinkyuujidai! Aizen, Sara Naru Shinka!
Situation urgente. La nouvelle évolution d`Aizen
緊急事態! 藍染, 更なる進化!

REGULAR.description:
Gin recalls his past and the fateful event that led him to become a Soul Reaper serving under Aizen. Meanwhile, Aizen’s overwhelming Spiritual Pressure forces Tatsuki, Keigo and the others to fall helplessly to the ground, when Ichigo finally arrives after completing his training.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu... Rangiku
Goodbye... Rangiku
Sayonara... Rangiku
さよなら... 乱菊

REGULAR.description:
Battle ensues between Aizen and Ichigo. His nineties-level Kido attack easily deflected, Aizen further evolves to best Ichigo. But Ichigo, now fully aware of why Tensa Zangetsu was reluctant to teach him the Final Getsugatensho, has come to possess amazing powers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fierce Fighting Conclusion! Release, the Final Getsuga Tensho!
Gekitou Kecchaku! Hanate, Saigo no Getsuga Tenshou!
La confrontation prend fin. L`ultime Getsuga Tenshô est libéré
激闘決着! 放て, 最後の月牙天衝!

REGULAR.description:
The battle in Karakura Town and the Soul Society has come to an end. Karakura Town is returned to the World of the Living using Mayuri’s technology, and everyone prepares to return to their respective places. Ichigo is reunited with his friends who have returned from Hueco Mundo, when his condition suddenly changes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo no Kakugo! Gekitou no Daishou
Ichigo`s Resolution! The Price of the Fierce Battle
La résolution d`Ichigo. Le prix de la bataille féroce
一護の覚悟! 激闘の代償

REGULAR.description:
Karakurizer is back! As Karakurizer, Kon tries to impress the ladies when a man named Michel appears. Strong, kind, handsome, and a true hero, Michel instantly gains popularity from the townspeople and the other Karakurizer. Can Karakurizer reclaim the title of No. 1 hero?! Go, Karakurizer!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Konsou Keiji Karakuraizer Saihasshin!
Le Soul Détective. Le Karakuraizer réapparait
The Soul Detective - Karakuraizer Takes Off Again!
魂葬刑事・カラクライザー再発進!

REGULAR.description:
While slacking off on his duties, Omaeda falls from a cliff. Recovering from the fall, Omaeda finds a young boy named Ryuzaburo staring at him with admiration and learns that he has unintentionally saved the boy’s life from a Hollow. When asked for his name, Omaeda lies and says he is the captain of Squad 2.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inauguration! The Brand New 2nd Division Captain!
L`inauguration du tout nouveau capitaine de la 2e division
Shuunin! Arata Naru Ni-Ban Tai Taichou!
就任! 新たなる二番隊隊長!

REGULAR.description:
While sparring with Ikkaku and Renji inside Squad 11’s dojo, Ichigo meets Seizo, whose mild-mannered personality seems out of place within the hot-blooded Squad 11. Once a powerful Soul Reaper, Seizo lost most of his spirit energy after taking a hit from a Hollow meant for Ikkaku. Ichigo, having seen Seizo’s unfair treatment within the squad, questions if he is truly content with his current life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juu-Ichi-Ban Tai ni Inochi o Kaketa Otoko!
L`homme aux commandes de la 11e division
The Man Who Takes Command of the 11th Division!
十一番隊に命を懸けた男!

REGULAR.description:
While Ichigo is looking into a possible Hollow incident in the World of the Living, Kon, inside Ichigo’s body, meets a beautiful woman who can see spirits. But the woman was dumped by her boyfriend because of this power and now wishes to die. Kon tries to stop the woman from killing herself when a handsome Hollow appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bijin OL no Himitsu
Kon l`a vu. Le secret d`une jolie femme de bureau
Secret of a Beautiful Office Lady
美人OLの秘密

REGULAR.description:
Yachiru encounters a Soul Reaper saving a girl from a Hollow, and quickly recognizes him as Masayoshi, her old friend. As the two celebrate their reunion, Yachiru learns that “Mappy” has lost his wife to a Hollow. Since then, Masayoshi has sworn to kill all Hollows for the people of the Rukon District, and for his late wife. But something about Masayoshi’s story does not sit well with Yachiru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ami de Yachiru. L`apparition du Shinigami de la justice
Yachiru no Tomo! Seigi no Shinigami Toujou!
Yachiru`s Friend! The Shinigami of Justice Appears!
やちるの友! 正義の死神登場!

REGULAR.description:
Hitsugaya has taken some time off and comes to Karakura Town to visit Haru, an old lady he met during a previous visit to the World of the Living. Grandma Haru introduces Hitsugaya and Karin to Yosuke, a young spirit who died before being able to experience his first snow. Hitsugaya decides to wait on performing Konso on Yosuke until the boy gets his wish, when Haru’s health suddenly worsens…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitsugaya Toushirou no Kyuujitsu!
Hitsugaya Toushirou`s Day Off!
Les vacances de Hitsugaya Toshirô
日番谷冬獅郎(ひつがやとうしろう)の休日!

REGULAR.description:
Peace has seemingly returned to both the World of the Living and the Soul Society with Aizen’s defeat. But reports of Soul Reapers going missing after entering the Precipice World begin to surface in the Soul Society. Meanwhile in the World of the Living, Kon finds an unconscious girl lying in the street and brings her home to care for, while Ichigo and Rukia discover that they are unable to contact the Soul Society.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Incident inhabituel au Seireitei
Seireitei ni Ihen! Gotei Juu-San Tai Shingun Hen!
Unusual Incident in Seireitei?! Gotei 13 Invading Army Arc!
瀞霊廷(せいれいてい)に異変! 護廷(ごてい)十三隊侵軍篇!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo is placed under arrest by the Soul Society under suspicion of being responsible for the disappearance of the Soul Reapers in the Precipice World. With Rukia’s help, the two make an escape, when Renji and Ikkaku appear to do battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Renji contre Rukia. Batailles entre camarades
Renji vs Rukia!? Nakama to no Tatakai!
Renji vs. Rukia?! Battle With Comrades!
恋次(れんじ)vsルキア!? 仲間との戦い!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Rukia find stored records on Nozomi at the Department of Research and Development, and realize the World of the Living is in danger. Hurrying to get back, the two regroup with Yoruichi, who proposes to get past the heavily guarded Senkaimon by force. Meanwhile in the World of the Living, Kon and Nozomi find themselves attacked by Kira, Nanao, and a Soul Reaper calling himself Kageroza.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo Hobakumou! Soul Society o Dasshutsu seyo!
Ichigo`s Capture Net! Escape From Soul Society!
Le filet de capture d`Ichigo. S`échapper de la Soul Society
一護捕縛網! 尸魂界を脱出せよ!

REGULAR.description:
The Thirteen Court Guard Squads who attacked Ichigo and Rukia in the Soul Society are revealed to be imposters known as Reigai, who have switched places with their originals. Thanks to the work of Mayuri, the real captains and lieutenants are rescued from the Precipice World, and they all regroup in the World of the Living to discuss how to deal with this new crisis. Meanwhile, to help Nozomi feel welcomed, Ichigo and the others decide to host a barbecue party, when Nozomi suddenly runs off.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gotei 13, Gathering in the Real World!
Gotei 13, réunion dans le monde réel
Gotei Juu-San Tai, Gensei ni Shuuketsu!
護廷十三隊, 現世に集結!

REGULAR.description:
Kon goes out to search for Nozomi and finds her wandering aimlessly. Meanwhile, the Soul Society has assembled a special team, including the Reigai of Ikkaku, Yumichika, and Hisagi, to apprehend Ichigo. The Reigai arrive in the World of the Living where they encounter their originals, and a battle ensues!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikkaku vs Ikkaku! Jibun Doushi no Tatakai!
Ikkaku vs. Ikkaku! Showdown of Mutual Self!
Épreuve de force face à soi-même, Ikkaku contre Ikkaku
一角(いっかく)vs一角! 自分同士の戦い!

REGULAR.description:
Rangiku faces the Reigai of Izuru, but the imposter’s Zanpakuto proves to be more powerful then she anticipated. Rukia is also having a tough battle against the Reigai of herself and Nemu, when help arrives from an unexpected person. Meanwhile in the Soul Society, Ukitake pleads for Kyoraku’s release to Central 46.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash! Rukia vs. Rukia!
Gekitotsu! Rukia vs Rukia!
Rukia contre Rukia
激突! ルキアVSルキア!

REGULAR.description:
Chad encounters Renji’s Reigai while searching for Nozomi, and a battle ensues between the two. Meanwhile, Unohana grows suspicious over the events surrounding Kyoraku’s arrest, and begins to conduct her own research. In the process, Unohana learns that Kageroza is the mastermind behind this incident.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mamore Ichigo! Nozomi no Ketsui!
Protect Ichigo! Nozomi`s Determination!
Protéger Nozomi. La détermination d`Ichigo
護れ一護! 望実の決意!

REGULAR.description:
The captains of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads take action to reclaim the Soul Society back from the Reigai.  As they successfully reenter the Soul Society, Kenpachi encounters his Reigai, and a fierce battle ensues. Meanwhile, Genryusai battles the Reigai of Kyoraku and Ukitake but notices something odd about their movements.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Recapture Seireitei!
Reprendre le Seireitei. Les capitaines en action
Seireitei Dakkan e! Taichou-tachi, Ugoku!
瀞霊廷(せいれいてい)奪還へ! 隊長たち, 動く!

REGULAR.description:
Moved by Ichigo and his friends’ efforts to protect her, Nozomi decides to stay with the group and begins to use her powers to heal Ichigo. Meanwhile in the Soul Society, Byakuya faces the Reigai of Hitsugaya.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For the Sake of the Believers! Byakuya vs. Hitsugaya!
Hitsugaya contre Byakuya
Shinzuru Mono no Tame ni! Byakuya vs Hitsugaya!
信ずるものの為に! 白哉(びゃくや)vs日番谷(ひつがや)!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo leaves for the Soul Society to join the battle, only to be ambushed by Kageroza, who intends to erase Ichigo’s existence. Back in the Soul Society, the wounded captains find themselves facing new Reigai to battle, while Hitsugaya is reunited with Hinamori.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deux Hinamori, la détermination de Hitsugaya
Futari no Hinamori, Hitsugaya no Kakugo
The Two Hinamori, Hitsugaya`s Resolution
ふたりの雛森, 日番谷の覚悟

REGULAR.description:
Captains of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads continue their battle to reclaim the Soul Society. Head Captain Yamamoto takes on the Reigai of Kyoraku and Ukitake, but is gradually overwhelmed by the two. Meanwhile in the World of the Living, Nozomi and the others learn of Ichigo’s disappearance inside the Precipice World.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuchiki-ke no Hokori! Byakuya VS Byakuya!
La fierté de la famille Kuchiki. Byakuya contre Byakuya
Pride of the Kuchiki Family! Byakuya Vs. Byakuya!
朽木家の誇り! 白哉VS白哉!

REGULAR.description:
Captains Hitsugaya and Kenpachi have located Kageroza and proceed to attack him, but Kageroza retaliates by controlling the Precipice World to his advantage. Back in the World of the Living, Nozomi and the others continue their search for the missing Ichigo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Defeat Kageroza! Shinigami, All-Out War!
Kagerouza o Taose! Shinigami, Souryokusen!
Vaincre Kageroza. Shinigami, guerre totale
影狼佐を倒せ! 死神, 総力戦!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo, who was swept away by the Cleaner inside the Precipice World, has safely returned to the World of the Living to everyone’s delight. Meanwhile in the Soul Society, the Reigai are revealed to be Mod Souls created by Kageroza.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kindan no Kenkyuu... Nozomi ni Kakusareta Himitsu!
La recherche interdite... Le secret caché de Nozomi
The Forbidden Research... Nozomi`s Hidden Secret!
禁断の研究... 望実に隠された秘密!

REGULAR.description:
The Soul Reapers in the World of the Living have lost contact with the captains in the Soul Society. Meanwhile, the revelation of Nozomi being a Mod Soul surprises Ichigo and his friends. Kon is particularly shocked, and is now unsure of how to interact with Nozomi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to Live...! Nozomi`s Zanpakutou
Ikitai...! Nozomi no Zanpakutou
Je veux vivre... Le Zanpakutô de Nozomi
生きたい...! 望実の斬魄刀

REGULAR.description:
Nozomi wishes to join the battle against the Reigai, believing her Zanpakuto may stand a chance against Kageroza’s Zanpakuto. But the Soul Reapers are unable to completely trust Nozomi due to her power not being fully awakened yet. Ichigo and his friends decide to help Nozomi by training her to reach Shikai.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For the Sake of Fighting! The Awakened Nozomi!
Pour combattre. Le réveil de Nozomi
Tatakau Tame ni! Mezameyo Nozomi!
戦うために! 目覚めよ望実!

REGULAR.description:
Having regained her Shikai, Nozomi tries to join Ichigo and the others to fight the Reigai captains, but the other Soul Reapers tell her not to interfere. In the midst of the battle, Hisagi and Izuru are brought down by the Reigai of Hitsugaya, who prepares to finish off the two lieutenants.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus mauvais Reigai, apparition dans le monde réel
Saikyou no Reigai, Gense ni Arawaru!
The Most Evil Reigai, Appearing in the Real World!
最凶の霊骸(れいがい), 現世に現る!

REGULAR.description:
Head Captain Genryusai Yamamoto steps in to battle against the Reigai. Ichigo and Nozomi join Genryusai, each taking on the Reigai of captains Unohana, Ukitake, and Kyoraku.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Destroy Nozomi!? Genryuusai`s Decision!
Détruire Nozomi. La décision de Genryusai
Nozomi o Kesu!? Genryuusai no Ketsudan!
望実を消す!? 元柳斎(げんりゅうさい)の決断!

REGULAR.description:
Nozomi’s Zanpakuto breaks in the midst of trying to protect Genryusai from Kageroza’s attack. As Ichigo and Kon try to save Nozomi from being taken away, Kageroza reveals a shocking secret between him and Nozomi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Reiatsu diminuant. Ichigo, lutte mortelle contre son âme
The Depleting Reiatsu! Ichigo, Death Struggle of the Soul!
Ushinawareru Reiatsu! Ichigo, Tamashii no Shitou!
失われる霊圧! 一護, 魂の死闘!

REGULAR.description:
Following his defeat by Kageroza, Ichigo has lost his Soul Reaper powers. Still determined to save Nozomi, Ichigo and his friends gather at Urahara’s shop to come up with a rescue plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Caché dans le Dangai. Un 2e Ichigo
Dangai ni Senpuku? Mou Hitori no Ichigo!?
Hiding in the Dangai? Ichigo is Alone?!
断界(だんがい)に潜伏? もう一人の一護(いちご)!?

REGULAR.description:
Inside the Precipice World, Rukia and the others act as decoys to draw away the Reigai’s attention while Ichigo, Urahara, and Kon break into the Seireitei. As they search for Kageroza’s laboratory, Urahara makes an attempt to restore Ichigo’s lost Soul Reaper powers but is discovered by the Reigai of Nemu and Nanao.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kagerouza o Oe! Gijutsu Kaihatsukyoku, Sennyuu!
Pursue Kageroza! Technological Development Department, Infiltration!
À la poursuite de Kageroza. Infiltration dans le département de recherche technologique
影狼佐(かげろうざ)を追え! 技術開発局, 潜入!

REGULAR.description:
The captains and lieutenants of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads thought to have fallen in battle return to fight the Reigai. Meanwhile, Ichigo’s spirit energy and Hollow powers continue to grow unstable, forcing him to rest for the time being.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaizou Konpaku no Kaihatsusha
Le développeur des âmes modifiées
The Developer of the Modified Souls
改造魂魄(こんぱく)の開発者

REGULAR.description:
Inside the Maggot’s Nest, Urahara and Kon find Ouko Yushima, the man behind Kageroza’s invasion. Finding traces of Kageroza’s blood nearby, the two follow the trail and finally discover Nozomi’s whereabouts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kon no Omoi, Nozomi no Omoi
Kon`s Thoughts, Nozomi`s Thoughts
Les sentiments de Kon, les sentiments de Nozomi
コンの想い, 望実の想い

REGULAR.description:
Kageroza, having regained his complete powers, sets out to kill the Hollowfied Ichigo when Rukia, Uryu, Renji, Chad, and Orihime arrive to stop him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo o Mamore! Nakama-tachi no Kizuna!
Protect Ichigo! The Bonds of Friends!
Protéger Ichigo. Le Lien de l`amitié
一護を護れ! 仲間たちの絆!

REGULAR.description:
The captains of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads find themselves gradually overpowered by the Reigai forces. Meanwhile, Rukia, Uryu, Renji and Chad use their teamwork to fight Kageroza.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Reigai VS Genshu, Hokori o Kaketa Gekitou!
Reigai Vs. Original, The Fierce Fighting for Gambled Pride!
Reigai contre l`original, le combat féroce de la fierté
霊骸vs原種, 誇りを賭けた激闘!

REGULAR.description:
An unexpected change comes over the Reigai as the Soul Reapers continue to fight them. Meanwhile, Ichigo and Kageroza have their final showdown.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invading Army Arc, Final Conclusion!
L`armée d`invasion, conclusion finale
Shingun Hen, Saishuu Kecchaku!
侵軍篇, 最終決着!

REGULAR.description:
Returning to the World of the Living, Ichigo spends his days hunting down Hollows with what little Spirit Energy he has left. However, knowing that Ichigo cannot continue this much longer, Rukia soon realizes the time of their parting is fast approaching.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arigatou
Merci
Thank You
ありがとう

REGULAR.description:
A year has passed since Ichigo lost his Soul Reaper powers, becoming a normal teenager. Now in his final year of high school, Ichigo lives an ordinary life surrounded by his family and friends. Despite finally getting the life he always wanted, Ichigo still feels as if something is lacking, when a mysterious man appears before him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3rd Year High School Student! Dressed up, and a New Chapter Begins!
Koukou 3 Nensei! Yosooi Arata ni Shinshou Kaishi!
Lycéen de 3e année. Paré pour le début d`un nouveau chapitre
高校3年生! 装い新たに新章開始!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Uryu deal with delinquents from another school that come looking for trouble. Following the incident, Ichigo’s boss Unagiya shows up and drags Ichigo back to the office, where he meets a man called Kugo Ginjo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Dispute in School?! Ichigo and Uryuu, Fight Together!
Gakkoukan Kousou!? Ichigo to Uryuu, Kyoutou!
Un conflit au lycée. Ichigo et Uryû combattent ensemble
学校間抗争!? 一護と雨竜, 共闘!

REGULAR.description:
Uryu is rushed to the hospital after being cut down by an unknown attacker. As Ichigo becomes frustrated over not being able to do anything when his friend was attacked, he learns that Keigo and Mizuro have disappeared.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Osowareta Uryuu, Nakama-tachi ni Semaru Kyoui!
Uryu is Attacked, A Threat Draws Near the Friends!
Uryû est attaqué, une menace se tisse autour de ses amis
襲われた雨竜, 仲間達に迫る脅威!

REGULAR.description:
Unable to bear seeing his friends get attacked, Ichigo decides to call on Ginjo for some answers. At his hideout, “Xcution,” Ginjo tells Ichigo of his goal to restore Ichigo’s lost Soul Reaper powers, as well as demonstrating his own unique power, “Fullbring.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fullbring no Nouryokusha: Ginjou Kuugo
L`utilisateur du Fullbring, Ginjô Kûgo
The Fullbring User: Ginjou Kuugo
完現術(フルブリング)の能力者·銀城空吾

REGULAR.description:
Ginjo gives Ichigo a day to decide whether to regain his lost Soul Reaper powers or not. But Ichigo, who no longer wishes to endanger anyone by being a Soul Reaper, decides to decline the offer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Creeping Danger in the Kurosaki Family?! Ichigo`s Confusion!
Kurosaki-ke ni Shinobiyoru Kiki!? Ichigo no Mayoi!
Un effrayant danger dans la famille Kurosaki. La confusion d`Ichigo
黒崎家に忍び寄る危機!? 一護の迷い!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo begins training to regain his Soul Reaper powers at the Xcution’s hideout. His first training is to fight and win against Mr. Pork, an opponent created by Riruka’s Fullbring power “Dollhouse.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daikoushou no Chikara, Ichigo no "Hokori"
Le pouvoir du badge du Shinigami remplaçant fait la fierté d`Ichigo
Power of the Substitute Badge, Ichigo`s "Pride"!
代行証の力, 一護の"誇り"

REGULAR.description:
On her way home from school, Orihime is suddenly stopped and asked to die by a man named Shishigawara. Confused at first, Orihime quickly realizes that Shishigawara may be related to Uryu’s attacker, and prepares to fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Next Target, The Devil`s Hand Aims at Orihime!
Prochaine cible, la main diabolique vise Orihime
Tsugi no Hyouteki, Orihime o Nerau Ma no Te!
次の標的, 織姫を狙う魔の手

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Chad rush to find Orihime, who they believe may be in danger. Meanwhile, Orihime attempts to stop Tsukishima from leaving the scene, but is instead stabbed by his Fullbring power, “Book of The End.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`homme qui a tué un shinigami remplaçant. Tsukishima se met en mouvement
Shinigami Daikou o Koroshita Otoko!? Ugokidasu Tsukishima
The Man Who Killed the Shinigami Substitute?! Tsukishima Makes His Move
死神代行を殺した男!?動き出す月島

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo asks Ginjo to let him fight one of the Xcution members for his training. But Jackie, who detests the power of Fullbring, finds Ichigo’s request selfish and refuses. Meanwhile, danger closes in on Chad.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fullbring, Imikirawareta Chikara
Fullbring, The Detested Power!
Le Fullbring, le pouvoir détesté
フルブリング, 忌み嫌われた力

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo begins his training with Jackie Tristan, who brings out her Fullbring power “Dirty Boots.” As he goes up against Jackie’s powerful attacks, Ichigo begins to gradually understand the use of his own Fullbring power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`attaque de Tsukishima. L`entrainement a été saboté
Tsukishima Attacks! The Training Has Been Thwarted
Tsukishima, Kyoushuu! Bougai Sareta Shugyou
月島, 強襲! 妨害された修行

REGULAR.description:
Tsukishima breaks into the Xcution hideout where Ichigo is training. Learning that he was the one who attacked Uryu and Orihime, a furious Ichigo proceeds to attack Tsukishima. But with his Fullbring power still incomplete, Ichigo finds himself gradually overpowered by his opponent.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo maîtrise le Fullbring
Ichigo, Fullbring Jutsu o Tsukai Konase!
Ichigo, Mastering the Fullbring!
護, 完現術を使いこなせ!

REGULAR.description:
Uryu asks Orihime to heal his injuries after sensing that his assailant has now made contact with Ichigo. Meanwhile, Ichigo enters his training with Ginjo inside Yukio’s Fulbring power “Invaders Must Die.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo contre Ginjô dans l`espace du jeu
Ichigo vs Ginjou, Game no Kuukan e
Ichigo vs. Ginjou! To the Game`s Space
護vs銀城, ゲームの空間へ

REGULAR.description:
On New Year’s Day, Izuru hosts a kite-flying contest in the hopes of everyone having a good time. Meanwhile, Rukia is practicing a dance she will perform for the New Year’s Celebration Ceremony but cannot seem to get the steps right.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les Shinigami entrent dans la bataille. Le Seireitei a aussi un Nouvel An spécial
Shinigami Sansen! Seireitei mo Oshougatsu SP!
The Shinigami Enter Battle! Seireitei Also Has a New Year Special!
死神参戦! 瀞霊廷もお正月SP!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo, with Orihime standing by as his healer, enters his training with Ginjo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Foe or Friend?! Ginjou`s Unseen Heart!
Teki ka Mikata ka!? Ginjou no Mienai Kokoro!
Un ennemi ou un ami. Le cœur invisible de Ginjô
敵か味方か!? 銀城の見えない心!

REGULAR.description:
Orihime and Chad exchange what information they have about Tsukishima to figure out what he has done to the both of them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Creeping Menace... Tsukishima`s Ability!
La capacité de la menace rampante, Tsukishima
Shinobiyoru Kyoui... Tsukishima no Nouryoku!
忍び寄る脅威... 月島の能力!

REGULAR.description:
Uryu begins his own investigation to track down the enemy who attacked him. As he goes around searching for clues, he notices that people close to Ichigo are acting strangely. Meanwhile, Ichigo’s Fullbring training is nearing its completion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash?! Xcution Attacks Ginjou
Gekitotsu!? Ginjou o Osou Xcution
L`Xcution a frappé Ginjô
激突!? 銀城を襲うXCUTION

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo escapes from his house in confusion after witnessing his friends and family welcoming Tsukishima as if they’ve known him for years. Regrouping with Ginjo, Ichigo learns that the same change has also happened to Riruka and the other Xcution members.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanashimi no Tatakai! Ichigo VS Sado & Orihime!
Le triste combat. Ichigo contre Chad et Orihime
The Sorrowful Battle! Ichigo vs. Sado & Orihime!
哀しみの戦い! 一護VS茶渡 & 織姫!

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo is shocked to learn that Chad and Orihime have now sided with Tsukishima and are even willing to fight Ichigo to protect their precious “friend.” Meanwhile, Ginjo races to help Ichigo, but the remaining members of Xcution halt his attempt.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo contre Uryû. Qui est le traître
Ichigo vs Uryuu!? Uragirimono wa Dare Da!
Ichigo vs. Uryuu?! Who is the Traitor?!
一護VS雨竜!? 裏切り者は誰だ!

REGULAR.description:
Ginjo reveals his true colors by attacking Ichigo and stripping him of his Fullbring powers. Ichigo lies in despair from losing his powers yet again, when his father Isshin and Kisuke Urahara arrive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Appearance! Meet the Gotei 13!
Arata na Sugata! Gotei Juu-San Tai, Kenzan!
Une nouvelle apparence. Rencontre avec le Gotei 13
新たな姿! 護廷十三隊, 見参!

REGULAR.description:
Under the orders of Head Captain Yamamoto, the 13 Court Guard Squad Soul Reapers share their Spirit Energy to restore Ichigo’s lost powers. With his Soul Reaper powers fully restored, Ichigo returns to challenge Ginjo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukkatsu! Shinigami Daikou Kurosaki Ichigo!
Retour d`Ichigo Kurosaki, le Shinigami remplaçant
Revival! Substitute Shinigami - Ichigo Kurosaki!
復活! 死神代行·黒崎一護!

REGULAR.description:
The Soul Reapers take on the Xcution members in one-on-one battles. Meanwhile, Ichigo and Uryu prepare to take on Ginjo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fierce Fight! Shinigami vs. XCUTION!
Gekitou! Shinigami vs Xcution!
Les Shinigami contre l`Xcution
激闘! 死神vsXCUTION!

REGULAR.description:
The battle between Byakuya and Tsukishima escalates as they both push their powers to the limit. Meanwhile, Rukia struggles against the cute traps set up by Riruka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Desperate Struggle!? Byakuya`s Troubled Memories
Lutte désespérée. Les pensées troubles de Byakuya
Zettai Zetsumei!? Kioku o Hasamareta Byakuya
絶体絶命!? 記憶を挟まれた白哉

REGULAR.description:
While facing each other in battle, Uryu notices that Ginjo’s attack contains the presence of Ichigo’s Spirit Energy. Ignoring Uryu’s warning, Ichigo fires his Getsugatensho attack, only to be countered by Ginjo’s own Getsugatensho attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo contre Ginjô. Le secret du badge de Shinigami remplaçant
Ichigo vs Ginjou! Daikoushou no Himitsu
Ichigo vs. Ginjou! The Secret of the Substitute Badge
一護VS銀城! 代行証の秘密

REGULAR.description:
Ichigo and Ginjo both release their Bankai to settle the score once and for all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Changing History, Unchanging Heart
Kawariyuku Rekishi, Kawaranu Kokoro
L’histoire change mais le cœur reste inchangé
変わりゆく歴史, 変わらぬ心
Jump Festa Anime Tour 2004 - Memories in the Rain
Bleach Jump Festa 2004 OVA
Jump Festa Anime Tour 2004 - Gotei 13 Omake
Jump Festa Anime Tour 2005 - The Sealed Sword Frenzy

SPECIAL.description: An animated adaptation of Tedious Everyday Tales Colorful Bleach chapters 29-36.

titles.title: Bleach Colorful! Jump Festa 2008 Special
Jump Festa Anime Tour 2008
Karaburi! Gotei Juusan Yatai Daisakusen!
カラブリ! 護廷十三屋台大作戦!
